4558class Image1DBuffer : public Image
4559{
4560public:
4561 Image1DBuffer(
4562 const Context& context,
4563 cl_mem_flags flags,
4564 ImageFormat format,
4565 size_type width,
4566 const Buffer &buffer,
4567 cl_int* err = NULL)
4568 {
4569 cl_int error;
4570 cl_image_desc desc =
4571 {
4572 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D_BUFFER,
4573 width,
4574 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
4575 buffer()
4576 };
4577 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4578 context(),
4579 flags,
4580 &format,
4581 &desc,
4582 NULL,
4583 &error);
4584
4585 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4586 if (err != NULL) {
4587 *err = error;
4588 }
4589 }

4642class Image1DArray : public Image
4643{
4644public:
4645 Image1DArray(
4646 const Context& context,
4647 cl_mem_flags flags,
4648 ImageFormat format,
4649 size_type arraySize,
4650 size_type width,
4651 size_type rowPitch,
4652 void* host_ptr = NULL,
4653 cl_int* err = NULL)
4654 {
4655 cl_int error;
4656 cl_image_desc desc =
4657 {
4658 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D_ARRAY,
4659 width,
4660 0, 0, // height, depth (unused)
4661 arraySize,
4662 rowPitch,
4663 0, 0, 0, 0
4664 };
4665 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4666 context(),
4667 flags,
4668 &format,
4669 &desc,
4670 host_ptr,
4671 &error);
4672
4673 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4674 if (err != NULL) {
4675 *err = error;
4676 }
4677 }
4678
4679 Image1DArray() { }
4680
4688 explicit Image1DArray(const cl_mem& imageArray, bool retainObject = false) :
4689 Image(imageArray, retainObject) { }
4690
4691
4692 Image1DArray& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4693 {
4694 Image::operator=(rhs);
4695 return *this;
4696 }
4697
4701 Image1DArray(const Image1DArray& img) : Image(img) {}
4702
4706 Image1DArray& operator = (const Image1DArray &img)
4707 {
4708 Image::operator=(img);
4709 return *this;
4710 }
4711
4715 Image1DArray(Image1DArray&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image(std::move(img)) {}
4716
4720 Image1DArray& operator = (Image1DArray &&img)
4721 {
4722 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
4723 return *this;
4724 }
4725
4726};
4727#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4728
4729
4736class Image2D : public Image
4737{
4738public:
4743 Image2D(
4744 const Context& context,
4745 cl_mem_flags flags,
4746 ImageFormat format,
4747 size_type width,
4748 size_type height,
4749 size_type row_pitch = 0,
4750 void* host_ptr = NULL,
4751 cl_int* err = NULL)
4752 {
4753 cl_int error;
4754 bool useCreateImage;
4755
4756#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4757 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
4758 {
4759 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
4760 useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
4761 }
4762#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4763 useCreateImage = true;
4764#else
4765 useCreateImage = false;
4766#endif
4767
4768#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4769 if (useCreateImage)
4770 {
4771 cl_image_desc desc =
4772 {
4773 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D,
4774 width,
4775 height,
4776 0, 0, // depth, array size (unused)
4777 row_pitch,
4778 0, 0, 0, 0
4779 };
4780 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4781 context(),
4782 flags,
4783 &format,
4784 &desc,
4785 host_ptr,
4786 &error);
4787
4788 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4789 if (err != NULL) {
4790 *err = error;
4791 }
4792 }
4793#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4794#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4795 if (!useCreateImage)
4796 {
4797 object_ = ::clCreateImage2D(
4798 context(), flags,&format, width, height, row_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
4799
4800 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE2D_ERR);
4801 if (err != NULL) {
4802 *err = error;
4803 }
4804 }
4805#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4806 }
4807
4808#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 || defined(CL_HPP_USE_CL_IMAGE2D_FROM_BUFFER_KHR)
4814 Image2D(
4815 const Context& context,
4816 ImageFormat format,
4817 const Buffer &sourceBuffer,
4818 size_type width,
4819 size_type height,
4820 size_type row_pitch = 0,
4821 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4822 {
4823 cl_int error;
4824
4825 cl_image_desc desc =
4826 {
4827 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D,
4828 width,
4829 height,
4830 0, 0, // depth, array size (unused)
4831 row_pitch,
4832 0, 0, 0,
4833 // Use buffer as input to image
4834 sourceBuffer()
4835 };
4836 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4837 context(),
4838 0, // flags inherited from buffer
4839 &format,
4840 &desc,
4841 nullptr,
4842 &error);
4843
4844 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4845 if (err != nullptr) {
4846 *err = error;
4847 }
4848 }
4849#endif //#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 || defined(CL_HPP_USE_CL_IMAGE2D_FROM_BUFFER_KHR)
4850
4851#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
4864 Image2D(
4865 const Context& context,
4866 cl_channel_order order,
4867 const Image &sourceImage,
4868 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4869 {
4870 cl_int error;
4871
4872 // Descriptor fields have to match source image
4873 size_type sourceWidth =
4874 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_WIDTH>();
4875 size_type sourceHeight =
4876 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_HEIGHT>();
4877 size_type sourceRowPitch =
4878 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_ROW_PITCH>();
4879 cl_uint sourceNumMIPLevels =
4880 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_NUM_MIP_LEVELS>();
4881 cl_uint sourceNumSamples =
4882 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_NUM_SAMPLES>();
4883 cl_image_format sourceFormat =
4884 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_FORMAT>();
4885
4886 // Update only the channel order.
4887 // Channel format inherited from source.
4888 sourceFormat.image_channel_order = order;
4889 cl_image_desc desc =
4890 {
4891 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D,
4892 sourceWidth,
4893 sourceHeight,
4894 0, 0, // depth (unused), array size (unused)
4895 sourceRowPitch,
4896 0, // slice pitch (unused)
4897 sourceNumMIPLevels,
4898 sourceNumSamples,
4899 // Use buffer as input to image
4900 sourceImage()
4901 };
4902 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4903 context(),
4904 0, // flags should be inherited from mem_object
4905 &sourceFormat,
4906 &desc,
4907 nullptr,
4908 &error);
4909
4910 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4911 if (err != nullptr) {
4912 *err = error;
4913 }
4914 }
4915#endif //#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
4916
4918 Image2D() { }
4919
4927 explicit Image2D(const cl_mem& image2D, bool retainObject = false) :
4928 Image(image2D, retainObject) { }
4929
4934 Image2D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4935 {
4936 Image::operator=(rhs);
4937 return *this;
4938 }
4939
4943 Image2D(const Image2D& img) : Image(img) {}
4944
4948 Image2D& operator = (const Image2D &img)
4949 {
4950 Image::operator=(img);
4951 return *this;
4952 }
4953
4957 Image2D(Image2D&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image(std::move(img)) {}
4958
4962 Image2D& operator = (Image2D &&img)
4963 {
4964 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
4965 return *this;
4966 }
4967
4968};
4969
4970
4971#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
4981class CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED Image2DGL : public Image2D
4982{
4983public:
4989 Image2DGL(
4990 const Context& context,
4991 cl_mem_flags flags,
4992 cl_GLenum target,
4993 cl_GLint miplevel,
4994 cl_GLuint texobj,
4995 cl_int * err = NULL)
4996 {
4997 cl_int error;
4998 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLTexture2D(
4999 context(),
5000 flags,
5001 target,
5002 miplevel,
5003 texobj,
5004 &error);
5005
5006 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_2D_ERR);
5007 if (err != NULL) {
5008 *err = error;
5009 }
5010
5011 }
5012
5014 Image2DGL() : Image2D() { }
5015
5023 explicit Image2DGL(const cl_mem& image, bool retainObject = false) :
5024 Image2D(image, retainObject) { }
5025
5030 Image2DGL& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5031 {
5032 Image2D::operator=(rhs);
5033 return *this;
5034 }
5035
5039 Image2DGL(const Image2DGL& img) : Image2D(img) {}
5040
5044 Image2DGL& operator = (const Image2DGL &img)
5045 {
5046 Image2D::operator=(img);
5047 return *this;
5048 }
5049
5053 Image2DGL(Image2DGL&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image2D(std::move(img)) {}
5054
5058 Image2DGL& operator = (Image2DGL &&img)
5059 {
5060 Image2D::operator=(std::move(img));
5061 return *this;
5062 }
5063
5064} CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
5065#endif // CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS
5066
5067#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5071class Image2DArray : public Image
5072{
5073public:
5074 Image2DArray(
5075 const Context& context,
5076 cl_mem_flags flags,
5077 ImageFormat format,
5078 size_type arraySize,
5079 size_type width,
5080 size_type height,
5081 size_type rowPitch,
5082 size_type slicePitch,
5083 void* host_ptr = NULL,
5084 cl_int* err = NULL)
5085 {
5086 cl_int error;
5087 cl_image_desc desc =
5088 {
5089 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D_ARRAY,
5090 width,
5091 height,
5092 0, // depth (unused)
5093 arraySize,
5094 rowPitch,
5095 slicePitch,
5096 0, 0, 0
5097 };
5098 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
5099 context(),
5100 flags,
5101 &format,
5102 &desc,
5103 host_ptr,
5104 &error);
5105
5106 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
5107 if (err != NULL) {
5108 *err = error;
5109 }
5110 }
5111
5112 Image2DArray() { }
5113
5121 explicit Image2DArray(const cl_mem& imageArray, bool retainObject = false) : Image(imageArray, retainObject) { }
5122
5123 Image2DArray& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5124 {
5125 Image::operator=(rhs);
5126 return *this;
5127 }
5128
5132 Image2DArray(const Image2DArray& img) : Image(img) {}
5133
5137 Image2DArray& operator = (const Image2DArray &img)
5138 {
5139 Image::operator=(img);
5140 return *this;
5141 }
5142
5146 Image2DArray(Image2DArray&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image(std::move(img)) {}
5147
5151 Image2DArray& operator = (Image2DArray &&img)
5152 {
5153 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
5154 return *this;
5155 }
5156};
5157#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5158
5165class Image3D : public Image
5166{
5167public:
5172 Image3D(
5173 const Context& context,
5174 cl_mem_flags flags,
5175 ImageFormat format,
5176 size_type width,
5177 size_type height,
5178 size_type depth,
5179 size_type row_pitch = 0,
5180 size_type slice_pitch = 0,
5181 void* host_ptr = NULL,
5182 cl_int* err = NULL)
5183 {
5184 cl_int error;
5185 bool useCreateImage;
5186
5187#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
5188 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
5189 {
5190 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
5191 useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
5192 }
5193#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5194 useCreateImage = true;
5195#else
5196 useCreateImage = false;
5197#endif
5198
5199#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5200 if (useCreateImage)
5201 {
5202 cl_image_desc desc =
5203 {
5204 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE3D,
5205 width,
5206 height,
5207 depth,
5208 0, // array size (unused)
5209 row_pitch,
5210 slice_pitch,
5211 0, 0, 0
5212 };
5213 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
5214 context(),
5215 flags,
5216 &format,
5217 &desc,
5218 host_ptr,
5219 &error);
5220
5221 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
5222 if (err != NULL) {
5223 *err = error;
5224 }
5225 }
5226#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5227#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
5228 if (!useCreateImage)
5229 {
5230 object_ = ::clCreateImage3D(
5231 context(), flags, &format, width, height, depth, row_pitch,
5232 slice_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
5233
5234 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE3D_ERR);
5235 if (err != NULL) {
5236 *err = error;
5237 }
5238 }
5239#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
5240 }
5241
5243 Image3D() : Image() { }
5244
5252 explicit Image3D(const cl_mem& image3D, bool retainObject = false) :
5253 Image(image3D, retainObject) { }
5254
5259 Image3D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5260 {
5261 Image::operator=(rhs);
5262 return *this;
5263 }
5264
5268 Image3D(const Image3D& img) : Image(img) {}
5269
5273 Image3D& operator = (const Image3D &img)
5274 {
5275 Image::operator=(img);
5276 return *this;
5277 }
5278
5282 Image3D(Image3D&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image(std::move(img)) {}
5283
5287 Image3D& operator = (Image3D &&img)
5288 {
5289 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
5290 return *this;
5291 }
5292};
5293
5294#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
5303class Image3DGL : public Image3D
5304{
5305public:
5311 Image3DGL(
5312 const Context& context,
5313 cl_mem_flags flags,
5314 cl_GLenum target,
5315 cl_GLint miplevel,
5316 cl_GLuint texobj,
5317 cl_int * err = NULL)
5318 {
5319 cl_int error;
5320 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLTexture3D(
5321 context(),
5322 flags,
5323 target,
5324 miplevel,
5325 texobj,
5326 &error);
5327
5328 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_3D_ERR);
5329 if (err != NULL) {
5330 *err = error;
5331 }
5332 }
5333
5335 Image3DGL() : Image3D() { }
5336
5344 explicit Image3DGL(const cl_mem& image, bool retainObject = false) :
5345 Image3D(image, retainObject) { }
5346
5351 Image3DGL& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5352 {
5353 Image3D::operator=(rhs);
5354 return *this;
5355 }
5356
5360 Image3DGL(const Image3DGL& img) : Image3D(img) {}
5361
5365 Image3DGL& operator = (const Image3DGL &img)
5366 {
5367 Image3D::operator=(img);
5368 return *this;
5369 }
5370
5374 Image3DGL(Image3DGL&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image3D(std::move(img)) {}
5375
5379 Image3DGL& operator = (Image3DGL &&img)
5380 {
5381 Image3D::operator=(std::move(img));
5382 return *this;
5383 }
5384};
5385#endif // CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS
5386
5387#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5394class ImageGL : public Image
5395{
5396public:
5397 ImageGL(
5398 const Context& context,
5399 cl_mem_flags flags,
5400 cl_GLenum target,
5401 cl_GLint miplevel,
5402 cl_GLuint texobj,
5403 cl_int * err = NULL)
5404 {
5405 cl_int error;
5406 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLTexture(
5407 context(),
5408 flags,
5409 target,
5410 miplevel,
5411 texobj,
5412 &error);
5413
5414 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_ERR);
5415 if (err != NULL) {
5416 *err = error;
5417 }
5418 }
5419
5420 ImageGL() : Image() { }
5421
5429 explicit ImageGL(const cl_mem& image, bool retainObject = false) :
5430 Image(image, retainObject) { }
5431
5432 ImageGL& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5433 {
5434 Image::operator=(rhs);
5435 return *this;
5436 }
5437
5441 ImageGL(const ImageGL& img) : Image(img) {}
5442
5446 ImageGL& operator = (const ImageGL &img)
5447 {
5448 Image::operator=(img);
5449 return *this;
5450 }
5451
5455 ImageGL(ImageGL&& img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Image(std::move(img)) {}
5456
5460 ImageGL& operator = (ImageGL &&img)
5461 {
5462 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
5463 return *this;
5464 }
5465};
5466#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120

5469
5470#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5477class Pipe : public Memory
5478{
5479public:
5480
5490 Pipe(
5491 const Context& context,
5492 cl_uint packet_size,
5493 cl_uint max_packets,
5494 cl_int* err = NULL)
5495 {
5496 cl_int error;
5497
5498 cl_mem_flags flags = CL_MEM_READ_WRITE | CL_MEM_HOST_NO_ACCESS;
5499 object_ = ::clCreatePipe(context(), flags, packet_size, max_packets, nullptr, &error);
5500
5501 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PIPE_ERR);
5502 if (err != NULL) {
5503 *err = error;
5504 }
5505 }
5506
5515 Pipe(
5516 cl_uint packet_size,
5517 cl_uint max_packets,
5518 cl_int* err = NULL)
5519 {
5520 cl_int error;
5521
5522 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
5523
5524 cl_mem_flags flags = CL_MEM_READ_WRITE | CL_MEM_HOST_NO_ACCESS;
5525 object_ = ::clCreatePipe(context(), flags, packet_size, max_packets, nullptr, &error);
5526
5527 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PIPE_ERR);
5528 if (err != NULL) {
5529 *err = error;
5530 }
5531 }
5532
5534 Pipe() : Memory() { }
5535
5543 explicit Pipe(const cl_mem& pipe, bool retainObject = false) :
5544 Memory(pipe, retainObject) { }
5545
5550 Pipe& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5551 {
5552 Memory::operator=(rhs);
5553 return *this;
5554 }
5555
5559 Pipe(const Pipe& pipe) : Memory(pipe) {}
5560
5564 Pipe& operator = (const Pipe &pipe)
5565 {
5566 Memory::operator=(pipe);
5567 return *this;
5568 }
5569
5573 Pipe(Pipe&& pipe) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : Memory(std::move(pipe)) {}
5574
5578 Pipe& operator = (Pipe &&pipe)
5579 {
5580 Memory::operator=(std::move(pipe));
5581 return *this;
5582 }
5583
5585 template <typename T>
5586 cl_int getInfo(cl_pipe_info name, T* param) const
5587 {
5588 return detail::errHandler(
5589 detail::getInfo(&::clGetPipeInfo, object_, name, param),
5590 __GET_PIPE_INFO_ERR);
5591 }
5592
5594 template <cl_pipe_info name> typename
5595 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_pipe_info, name>::param_type
5596 getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
5597 {
5598 typename detail::param_traits<
5599 detail::cl_pipe_info, name>::param_type param;
5600 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5601 if (err != NULL) {
5602 *err = result;
5603 }
5604 return param;
5605 }
5606}; // class Pipe
5607#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5608
5609
5618class Sampler : public detail::Wrapper<cl_sampler>
5619{
5620public:
5622 Sampler() { }
5623
5628 Sampler(
5629 const Context& context,
5630 cl_bool normalized_coords,
5631 cl_addressing_mode addressing_mode,
5632 cl_filter_mode filter_mode,
5633 cl_int* err = NULL)
5634 {
5635 cl_int error;
5636
5637#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5638 cl_sampler_properties sampler_properties[] = {
5639 CL_SAMPLER_NORMALIZED_COORDS, normalized_coords,
5640 CL_SAMPLER_ADDRESSING_MODE, addressing_mode,
5641 CL_SAMPLER_FILTER_MODE, filter_mode,
5642 0 };
5643 object_ = ::clCreateSamplerWithProperties(
5644 context(),
5645 sampler_properties,
5646 &error);
5647
5648 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SAMPLER_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
5649 if (err != NULL) {
5650 *err = error;
5651 }
5652#else
5653 object_ = ::clCreateSampler(
5654 context(),
5655 normalized_coords,
5656 addressing_mode,
5657 filter_mode,
5658 &error);
5659
5660 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SAMPLER_ERR);
5661 if (err != NULL) {
5662 *err = error;
5663 }
5664#endif
5665 }
5666
5675 explicit Sampler(const cl_sampler& sampler, bool retainObject = false) :
5676 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(sampler, retainObject) { }
5677
5683 Sampler& operator = (const cl_sampler& rhs)
5684 {
5685 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
5686 return *this;
5687 }
5688
5692 Sampler(const Sampler& sam) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(sam) {}
5693
5697 Sampler& operator = (const Sampler &sam)
5698 {
5699 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(sam);
5700 return *this;
5701 }
5702
5706 Sampler(Sampler&& sam) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(sam)) {}
5707
5711 Sampler& operator = (Sampler &&sam)
5712 {
5713 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(sam));
5714 return *this;
5715 }
5716
5718 template <typename T>
5719 cl_int getInfo(cl_sampler_info name, T* param) const
5720 {
5721 return detail::errHandler(
5722 detail::getInfo(&::clGetSamplerInfo, object_, name, param),
5723 __GET_SAMPLER_INFO_ERR);
5724 }
5725
5727 template <cl_sampler_info name> typename
5728 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_sampler_info, name>::param_type
5729 getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
5730 {
5731 typename detail::param_traits<
5732 detail::cl_sampler_info, name>::param_type param;
5733 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5734 if (err != NULL) {
5735 *err = result;
5736 }
5737 return param;
5738 }
5739};
5740
5741class Program;
5742class CommandQueue;
5743class DeviceCommandQueue;
5744class Kernel;
5745
5747class NDRange
5748{
5749private:
5750 size_type sizes_[3];
5751 cl_uint dimensions_;
5752
5753public:
5755 NDRange()
5756 : dimensions_(0)
5757 {
5758 sizes_[0] = 0;
5759 sizes_[1] = 0;
5760 sizes_[2] = 0;
5761 }
5762
5764 NDRange(size_type size0)
5765 : dimensions_(1)
5766 {
5767 sizes_[0] = size0;
5768 sizes_[1] = 1;
5769 sizes_[2] = 1;
5770 }
5771
5773 NDRange(size_type size0, size_type size1)
5774 : dimensions_(2)
5775 {
5776 sizes_[0] = size0;
5777 sizes_[1] = size1;
5778 sizes_[2] = 1;
5779 }
5780
5782 NDRange(size_type size0, size_type size1, size_type size2)
5783 : dimensions_(3)
5784 {
5785 sizes_[0] = size0;
5786 sizes_[1] = size1;
5787 sizes_[2] = size2;
5788 }
5789
5794 operator const size_type*() const {
5795 return sizes_;
5796 }
5797
5799 size_type dimensions() const
5800 {
5801 return dimensions_;
5802 }
5803
5805 // runtime number of dimensions
5806 size_type size() const
5807 {
5808 return dimensions_*sizeof(size_type);
5809 }
5810
5811 size_type* get()
5812 {
5813 return sizes_;
5814 }
5815
5816 const size_type* get() const
5817 {
5818 return sizes_;
5819 }
5820};
5821
5823static const NDRange NullRange;
5824
5826struct LocalSpaceArg
5827{
5828 size_type size_;
5829};
5830
5831namespace detail {
5832
5833template <typename T, class Enable = void>
5834struct KernelArgumentHandler;
5835
5836// Enable for objects that are not subclasses of memory
5837// Pointers, constants etc
5838template <typename T>
5839struct KernelArgumentHandler<T, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_base_of<cl::Memory, T>::value>::type>
5840{
5841 static size_type size(const T&) { return sizeof(T); }
5842 static const T* ptr(const T& value) { return &value; }
5843};
5844
5845// Enable for subclasses of memory where we want to get a reference to the cl_mem out
5846// and pass that in for safety
5847template <typename T>
5848struct KernelArgumentHandler<T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_base_of<cl::Memory, T>::value>::type>
5849{
5850 static size_type size(const T&) { return sizeof(cl_mem); }
5851 static const cl_mem* ptr(const T& value) { return &(value()); }
5852};
5853
5854// Specialization for DeviceCommandQueue defined later
5855
5856template <>
5857struct KernelArgumentHandler<LocalSpaceArg, void>
5858{
5859 static size_type size(const LocalSpaceArg& value) { return value.size_; }
5860 static const void* ptr(const LocalSpaceArg&) { return NULL; }
5861};
5862
5863}
5865
5869inline LocalSpaceArg
5870Local(size_type size)
5871{
5872 LocalSpaceArg ret = { size };
5873 return ret;
5874}
5875
5884class Kernel : public detail::Wrapper<cl_kernel>
5885{
5886public:
5887 inline Kernel(const Program& program, const char* name, cl_int* err = NULL);
5888
5890 Kernel() { }
5891
5900 explicit Kernel(const cl_kernel& kernel, bool retainObject = false) :
5901 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(kernel, retainObject) { }
5902
5908 Kernel& operator = (const cl_kernel& rhs)
5909 {
5910 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
5911 return *this;
5912 }
5913
5917 Kernel(const Kernel& kernel) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(kernel) {}
5918
5922 Kernel& operator = (const Kernel &kernel)
5923 {
5924 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(kernel);
5925 return *this;
5926 }
5927
5931 Kernel(Kernel&& kernel) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(kernel)) {}
5932
5936 Kernel& operator = (Kernel &&kernel)
5937 {
5938 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(kernel));
5939 return *this;
5940 }
5941
5942 template <typename T>
5943 cl_int getInfo(cl_kernel_info name, T* param) const
5944 {
5945 return detail::errHandler(
5946 detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelInfo, object_, name, param),
5947 __GET_KERNEL_INFO_ERR);
5948 }
5949
5950 template <cl_kernel_info name> typename
5951 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_info, name>::param_type
5952 getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
5953 {
5954 typename detail::param_traits<
5955 detail::cl_kernel_info, name>::param_type param;
5956 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5957 if (err != NULL) {
5958 *err = result;
5959 }
5960 return param;
5961 }
5962
5963#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5964 template <typename T>
5965 cl_int getArgInfo(cl_uint argIndex, cl_kernel_arg_info name, T* param) const
5966 {
5967 return detail::errHandler(
5968 detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelArgInfo, object_, argIndex, name, param),
5969 __GET_KERNEL_ARG_INFO_ERR);
5970 }
5971
5972 template <cl_kernel_arg_info name> typename
5973 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_arg_info, name>::param_type
5974 getArgInfo(cl_uint argIndex, cl_int* err = NULL) const
5975 {
5976 typename detail::param_traits<
5977 detail::cl_kernel_arg_info, name>::param_type param;
5978 cl_int result = getArgInfo(argIndex, name, &param);
5979 if (err != NULL) {
5980 *err = result;
5981 }
5982 return param;
5983 }
5984#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5985
5986 template <typename T>
5987 cl_int getWorkGroupInfo(
5988 const Device& device, cl_kernel_work_group_info name, T* param) const
5989 {
5990 return detail::errHandler(
5991 detail::getInfo(
5992 &::clGetKernelWorkGroupInfo, object_, device(), name, param),
5993 __GET_KERNEL_WORK_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
5994 }
5995
5996 template <cl_kernel_work_group_info name> typename
5997 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_work_group_info, name>::param_type
5998 getWorkGroupInfo(const Device& device, cl_int* err = NULL) const
5999 {
6000 typename detail::param_traits<
6001 detail::cl_kernel_work_group_info, name>::param_type param;
6002 cl_int result = getWorkGroupInfo(device, name, &param);
6003 if (err != NULL) {
6004 *err = result;
6005 }
6006 return param;
6007 }
6008
6009#if (CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && defined(CL_HPP_USE_CL_SUB_GROUPS_KHR)) || CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6010 cl_int getSubGroupInfo(const cl::Device &dev, cl_kernel_sub_group_info name, const cl::NDRange &range, size_type* param) const
6011 {
6012#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6013
6014 return detail::errHandler(
6015 clGetKernelSubGroupInfo(object_, dev(), name, range.size(), range.get(), sizeof(size_type), param, nullptr),
6016 __GET_KERNEL_SUB_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
6017
6018#else // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6019
6020 typedef clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR_fn PFN_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR;
6021 static PFN_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR pfn_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR = NULL;
6022 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR);
6023
6024 return detail::errHandler(
6025 pfn_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR(object_, dev(), name, range.size(), range.get(), sizeof(size_type), param, nullptr),
6026 __GET_KERNEL_SUB_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
6027
6028#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6029 }
6030
6031 template <cl_kernel_sub_group_info name>
6032 size_type getSubGroupInfo(const cl::Device &dev, const cl::NDRange &range, cl_int* err = NULL) const
6033 {
6034 size_type param;
6035 cl_int result = getSubGroupInfo(dev, name, range, &param);
6036 if (err != NULL) {
6037 *err = result;
6038 }
6039 return param;
6040 }
6041#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
6042
6043#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
6046 template<typename T, class D>
6047 cl_int setArg(cl_uint index, const cl::pointer<T, D> &argPtr)
6048 {
6049 return detail::errHandler(
6050 ::clSetKernelArgSVMPointer(object_, index, argPtr.get()),
6051 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
6052 }
6053
6056 template<typename T, class Alloc>
6057 cl_int setArg(cl_uint index, const cl::vector<T, Alloc> &argPtr)
6058 {
6059 return detail::errHandler(
6060 ::clSetKernelArgSVMPointer(object_, index, argPtr.data()),
6061 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
6062 }
6063
6066 template<typename T>
6067 typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<T>::value, cl_int>::type
6068 setArg(cl_uint index, const T argPtr)
6069 {
6070 return detail::errHandler(
6071 ::clSetKernelArgSVMPointer(object_, index, argPtr),
6072 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
6073 }
6074#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
6075
6078 template <typename T>
6079 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_pointer<T>::value, cl_int>::type
6080 setArg(cl_uint index, const T &value)
6081 {
6082 return detail::errHandler(
6083 ::clSetKernelArg(
6084 object_,
6085 index,
6086 detail::KernelArgumentHandler<T>::size(value),
6087 detail::KernelArgumentHandler<T>::ptr(value)),
6088 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
6089 }
6090
6091 cl_int setArg(cl_uint index, size_type size, const void* argPtr)
6092 {
6093 return detail::errHandler(
6094 ::clSetKernelArg(object_, index, size, argPtr),
6095 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
6096 }
6097
6098#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
6103 cl_int setSVMPointers(const vector<void*> &pointerList)
6104 {
6105 return detail::errHandler(
6106 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6107 object_,
6108 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_PTRS,
6109 sizeof(void*)*pointerList.size(),
6110 pointerList.data()));
6111 }
6112
6117 template<int ArrayLength>
6118 cl_int setSVMPointers(const std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList)
6119 {
6120 return detail::errHandler(
6121 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6122 object_,
6123 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_PTRS,
6124 sizeof(void*)*pointerList.size(),
6125 pointerList.data()));
6126 }
6127
6139 cl_int enableFineGrainedSystemSVM(bool svmEnabled)
6140 {
6141 cl_bool svmEnabled_ = svmEnabled ? CL_TRUE : CL_FALSE;
6142 return detail::errHandler(
6143 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6144 object_,
6145 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_FINE_GRAIN_SYSTEM,
6146 sizeof(cl_bool),
6147 &svmEnabled_
6148 )
6149 );
6150 }
6151
6152 template<int index, int ArrayLength, class D, typename T0, typename T1, typename... Ts>
6153 void setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, const pointer<T0, D> &t0, const pointer<T1, D> &t1, Ts & ... ts)
6154 {
6155 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0.get());
6156 setSVMPointersHelper<index + 1, ArrayLength>(pointerList, t1, ts...);
6157 }
6158
6159 template<int index, int ArrayLength, typename T0, typename T1, typename... Ts>
6160 typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<T0>::value, void>::type
6161 setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, T0 t0, T1 t1, Ts... ts)
6162 {
6163 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0);
6164 setSVMPointersHelper<index + 1, ArrayLength>(pointerList, t1, ts...);
6165 }
6166
6167 template<int index, int ArrayLength, typename T0, class D>
6168 void setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, const pointer<T0, D> &t0)
6169 {
6170 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0.get());
6171 }
6172
6173
6174 template<int index, int ArrayLength, typename T0>
6175 typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<T0>::value, void>::type
6176 setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, T0 t0)
6177 {
6178 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0);
6179 }
6180
6181 template<typename T0, typename... Ts>
6182 cl_int setSVMPointers(const T0 &t0, Ts & ... ts)
6183 {
6184 std::array<void*, 1 + sizeof...(Ts)> pointerList;
6185
6186 setSVMPointersHelper<0, 1 + sizeof...(Ts)>(pointerList, t0, ts...);
6187 return detail::errHandler(
6188 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6189 object_,
6190 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_PTRS,
6191 sizeof(void*)*(1 + sizeof...(Ts)),
6192 pointerList.data()));
6193 }
6194
6195 template<typename T>
6196 cl_int setExecInfo(cl_kernel_exec_info param_name, const T& val)
6197 {
6198 return detail::errHandler(
6199 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6200 object_,
6201 param_name,
6202 sizeof(T),
6203 &val));
6204 }
6205
6206 template<cl_kernel_exec_info name>
6207 cl_int setExecInfo(typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_exec_info, name>::param_type& val)
6208 {
6209 return setExecInfo(name, val);
6210 }
6211#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
6212
6213#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6219 Kernel clone()
6220 {
6221 cl_int error;
6222 Kernel retValue(clCloneKernel(this->get(), &error));
6223
6224 detail::errHandler(error, __CLONE_KERNEL_ERR);
6225 return retValue;
6226 }
6227#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6228};
6229
6233class Program : public detail::Wrapper<cl_program>
6234{
6235public:
6236#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6237 typedef vector<vector<unsigned char>> Binaries;
6238 typedef vector<string> Sources;
6239#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6240 typedef vector<std::pair<const void*, size_type> > Binaries;
6241 typedef vector<std::pair<const char*, size_type> > Sources;
6242#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6243
6244 Program(
6245 const string& source,
6246 bool build = false,
6247 cl_int* err = NULL)
6248 {
6249 cl_int error;
6250
6251 const char * strings = source.c_str();
6252 const size_type length = source.size();
6253
6254 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
6255
6256 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6257 context(), (cl_uint)1, &strings, &length, &error);
6258
6259 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6260
6261 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6262
6263 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6264 object_,
6265 0,
6266 NULL,
6267#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6268 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6269#else
6270 "",
6271#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6272 NULL,
6273 NULL);
6274
6275 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6276 }
6277
6278 if (err != NULL) {
6279 *err = error;
6280 }
6281 }
6282
6283 Program(
6284 const Context& context,
6285 const string& source,
6286 bool build = false,
6287 cl_int* err = NULL)
6288 {
6289 cl_int error;
6290
6291 const char * strings = source.c_str();
6292 const size_type length = source.size();
6293
6294 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6295 context(), (cl_uint)1, &strings, &length, &error);
6296
6297 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6298
6299 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6300 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6301 object_,
6302 0,
6303 NULL,
6304#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6305 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6306#else
6307 "",
6308#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6309 NULL,
6310 NULL);
6311
6312 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6313 }
6314
6315 if (err != NULL) {
6316 *err = error;
6317 }
6318 }
6319
6324 Program(
6325 const Sources& sources,
6326 cl_int* err = NULL)
6327 {
6328 cl_int error;
6329 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
6330
6331 const size_type n = (size_type)sources.size();
6332
6333 vector<size_type> lengths(n);
6334 vector<const char*> strings(n);
6335
6336 for (size_type i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
6337#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6338 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].data();
6339 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].length();
6340#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6341 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].first;
6342 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].second;
6343#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6344 }
6345
6346 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6347 context(), (cl_uint)n, strings.data(), lengths.data(), &error);
6348
6349 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6350 if (err != NULL) {
6351 *err = error;
6352 }
6353 }
6354
6359 Program(
6360 const Context& context,
6361 const Sources& sources,
6362 cl_int* err = NULL)
6363 {
6364 cl_int error;
6365
6366 const size_type n = (size_type)sources.size();
6367
6368 vector<size_type> lengths(n);
6369 vector<const char*> strings(n);
6370
6371 for (size_type i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
6372#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6373 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].data();
6374 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].length();
6375#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6376 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].first;
6377 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].second;
6378#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6379 }
6380
6381 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6382 context(), (cl_uint)n, strings.data(), lengths.data(), &error);
6383
6384 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6385 if (err != NULL) {
6386 *err = error;
6387 }
6388 }
6389
6390
6391#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210 || (CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION==200 && defined(CL_HPP_USE_IL_KHR))
6396 Program(
6397 const vector<char>& IL,
6398 bool build = false,
6399 cl_int* err = NULL)
6400 {
6401 cl_int error;
6402
6403 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
6404
6405#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6406
6407 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithIL(
6408 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6409
6410#else // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6411
6412 typedef clCreateProgramWithILKHR_fn PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR;
6413 static PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR = NULL;
6414 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateProgramWithILKHR);
6415
6416 return detail::errHandler(
6417 pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR(
6418 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6419
6420#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6421
6422 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_IL_ERR);
6423
6424 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6425
6426 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6427 object_,
6428 0,
6429 NULL,
6430#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6431 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6432#else
6433 "",
6434#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6435 NULL,
6436 NULL);
6437
6438 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6439 }
6440
6441 if (err != NULL) {
6442 *err = error;
6443 }
6444 }
6445
6451 Program(
6452 const Context& context,
6453 const vector<char>& IL,
6454 bool build = false,
6455 cl_int* err = NULL)
6456 {
6457 cl_int error;
6458
6459#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6460
6461 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithIL(
6462 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6463
6464#else // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6465
6466 typedef clCreateProgramWithILKHR_fn PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR;
6467 static PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR = NULL;
6468 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateProgramWithILKHR);
6469
6470 return detail::errHandler(
6471 pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR(
6472 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6473
6474#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6475
6476 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_IL_ERR);
6477
6478 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6479 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6480 object_,
6481 0,
6482 NULL,
6483#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6484 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6485#else
6486 "",
6487#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6488 NULL,
6489 NULL);
6490
6491 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6492 }
6493
6494 if (err != NULL) {
6495 *err = error;
6496 }
6497 }
6498#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6499
6519 Program(
6520 const Context& context,
6521 const vector<Device>& devices,
6522 const Binaries& binaries,
6523 vector<cl_int>* binaryStatus = NULL,
6524 cl_int* err = NULL)
6525 {
6526 cl_int error;
6527
6528 const size_type numDevices = devices.size();
6529
6530 // Catch size mismatch early and return
6531 if(binaries.size() != numDevices) {
6532 error = CL_INVALID_VALUE;
6533 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR);
6534 if (err != NULL) {
6535 *err = error;
6536 }
6537 return;
6538 }
6539
6540
6541 vector<size_type> lengths(numDevices);
6542 vector<const unsigned char*> images(numDevices);
6543#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6544 for (size_type i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i) {
6545 images[i] = binaries[i].data();
6546 lengths[i] = binaries[(int)i].size();
6547 }
6548#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6549 for (size_type i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i) {
6550 images[i] = (const unsigned char*)binaries[i].first;
6551 lengths[i] = binaries[(int)i].second;
6552 }
6553#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6554
6555 vector<cl_device_id> deviceIDs(numDevices);
6556 for( size_type deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
6557 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
6558 }
6559
6560 if(binaryStatus) {
6561 binaryStatus->resize(numDevices);
6562 }
6563
6564 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithBinary(
6565 context(), (cl_uint) devices.size(),
6566 deviceIDs.data(),
6567 lengths.data(), images.data(), (binaryStatus != NULL && numDevices > 0)
6568 ? &binaryStatus->front()
6569 : NULL, &error);
6570
6571 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR);
6572 if (err != NULL) {
6573 *err = error;
6574 }
6575 }
6576
6577
6578#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6583 Program(
6584 const Context& context,
6585 const vector<Device>& devices,
6586 const string& kernelNames,
6587 cl_int* err = NULL)
6588 {
6589 cl_int error;
6590
6591
6592 size_type numDevices = devices.size();
6593 vector<cl_device_id> deviceIDs(numDevices);
6594 for( size_type deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
6595 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
6596 }
6597
6598 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithBuiltInKernels(
6599 context(),
6600 (cl_uint) devices.size(),
6601 deviceIDs.data(),
6602 kernelNames.c_str(),
6603 &error);
6604
6605 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BUILT_IN_KERNELS_ERR);
6606 if (err != NULL) {
6607 *err = error;
6608 }
6609 }
6610#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6611
6612 Program() { }
6613
6614
6621 explicit Program(const cl_program& program, bool retainObject = false) :
6622 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(program, retainObject) { }
6623
6624 Program& operator = (const cl_program& rhs)
6625 {
6626 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
6627 return *this;
6628 }
6629
6633 Program(const Program& program) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(program) {}
6634
6638 Program& operator = (const Program &program)
6639 {
6640 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(program);
6641 return *this;
6642 }
6643
6647 Program(Program&& program) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(program)) {}
6648
6652 Program& operator = (Program &&program)
6653 {
6654 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(program));
6655 return *this;
6656 }
6657
6658 cl_int build(
6659 const vector<Device>& devices,
6660 const char* options = NULL,
6661 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
6662 void* data = NULL) const
6663 {
6664 size_type numDevices = devices.size();
6665 vector<cl_device_id> deviceIDs(numDevices);
6666
6667 for( size_type deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
6668 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
6669 }
6670
6671 cl_int buildError = ::clBuildProgram(
6672 object_,
6673 (cl_uint)
6674 devices.size(),
6675 deviceIDs.data(),
6676 options,
6677 notifyFptr,
6678 data);
6679
6680 return detail::buildErrHandler(buildError, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6681 }
6682
6683 cl_int build(
6684 const Device& device,
6685 const char* options = NULL,
6686 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
6687 void* data = NULL) const
6688 {
6689 cl_device_id deviceID = device();
6690
6691 cl_int buildError = ::clBuildProgram(
6692 object_,
6693 1,
6694 &deviceID,
6695 options,
6696 notifyFptr,
6697 data);
6698
6699 BuildLogType buildLog(1);
6700 buildLog.push_back(std::make_pair(device, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>(device)));
6701 return detail::buildErrHandler(buildError, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, buildLog);
6702 }
6703
6704 cl_int build(
6705 const char* options = NULL,
6706 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
6707 void* data = NULL) const
6708 {
6709 cl_int buildError = ::clBuildProgram(
6710 object_,
6711 0,
6712 NULL,
6713 options,
6714 notifyFptr,
6715 data);
6716
6717 return detail::buildErrHandler(buildError, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6718 }
6719
6720#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6721 cl_int compile(
6722 const char* options = NULL,
6723 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
6724 void* data = NULL) const
6725 {
6726 cl_int error = ::clCompileProgram(
6727 object_,
6728 0,
6729 NULL,
6730 options,
6731 0,
6732 NULL,
6733 NULL,
6734 notifyFptr,
6735 data);
6736 return detail::buildErrHandler(error, __COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6737 }
6738#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6739
6740 template <typename T>
6741 cl_int getInfo(cl_program_info name, T* param) const
6742 {
6743 return detail::errHandler(
6744 detail::getInfo(&::clGetProgramInfo, object_, name, param),
6745 __GET_PROGRAM_INFO_ERR);
6746 }
6747
6748 template <cl_program_info name> typename
6749 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_info, name>::param_type
6750 getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
6751 {
6752 typename detail::param_traits<
6753 detail::cl_program_info, name>::param_type param;
6754 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
6755 if (err != NULL) {
6756 *err = result;
6757 }
6758 return param;
6759 }
6760
6761 template <typename T>
6762 cl_int getBuildInfo(
6763 const Device& device, cl_program_build_info name, T* param) const
6764 {
6765 return detail::errHandler(
6766 detail::getInfo(
6767 &::clGetProgramBuildInfo, object_, device(), name, param),
6768 __GET_PROGRAM_BUILD_INFO_ERR);
6769 }
6770
6771 template <cl_program_build_info name> typename
6772 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type
6773 getBuildInfo(const Device& device, cl_int* err = NULL) const
6774 {
6775 typename detail::param_traits<
6776 detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type param;
6777 cl_int result = getBuildInfo(device, name, &param);
6778 if (err != NULL) {
6779 *err = result;
6780 }
6781 return param;
6782 }
6783
6789 template <cl_program_build_info name>
6790 vector<std::pair<cl::Device, typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type>>
6791 getBuildInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const
6792 {
6793 cl_int result = CL_SUCCESS;
6794
6795 auto devs = getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_DEVICES>(&result);
6796 vector<std::pair<cl::Device, typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type>>
6797 devInfo;
6798
6799 // If there was an initial error from getInfo return the error
6800 if (result != CL_SUCCESS) {
6801 if (err != NULL) {
6802 *err = result;
6803 }
6804 return devInfo;
6805 }
6806
6807 for (const cl::Device &d : devs) {
6808 typename detail::param_traits<
6809 detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type param;
6810 result = getBuildInfo(d, name, &param);
6811 devInfo.push_back(
6812 std::pair<cl::Device, typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type>
6813 (d, param));
6814 if (result != CL_SUCCESS) {
6815 // On error, leave the loop and return the error code
6816 break;
6817 }
6818 }
6819 if (err != NULL) {
6820 *err = result;
6821 }
6822 if (result != CL_SUCCESS) {
6823 devInfo.clear();
6824 }
6825 return devInfo;
6826 }
6827
6828 cl_int createKernels(vector<Kernel>* kernels)
6829 {
6830 cl_uint numKernels;
6831 cl_int err = ::clCreateKernelsInProgram(object_, 0, NULL, &numKernels);
6832 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
6833 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR);
6834 }
6835
6836 vector<cl_kernel> value(numKernels);
6837
6838 err = ::clCreateKernelsInProgram(
6839 object_, numKernels, value.data(), NULL);
6840 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
6841 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR);
6842 }
6843
6844 if (kernels) {
6845 kernels->resize(value.size());
6846
6847 // Assign to param, constructing with retain behaviour
6848 // to correctly capture each underlying CL object
6849 for (size_type i = 0; i < value.size(); i++) {
6850 // We do not need to retain because this kernel is being created
6851 // by the runtime
6852 (*kernels)[i] = Kernel(value[i], false);
6853 }
6854 }
6855 return CL_SUCCESS;
6856 }
6857
6858#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
6859#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_2_2_APIS)
6870 CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_2_2_DEPRECATED cl_int setReleaseCallback(
6871 void (CL_CALLBACK * pfn_notify)(cl_program program, void * user_data),
6872 void * user_data = NULL) CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_2_2_DEPRECATED
6873 {
6874 return detail::errHandler(
6875 ::clSetProgramReleaseCallback(
6876 object_,
6877 pfn_notify,
6878 user_data),
6879 __SET_PROGRAM_RELEASE_CALLBACK_ERR);
6880 }
6881#endif // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_2_2_APIS)
6882
6887 template <typename T>
6888 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_pointer<T>::value, cl_int>::type
6889 setSpecializationConstant(cl_uint index, const T &value)
6890 {
6891 return detail::errHandler(
6892 ::clSetProgramSpecializationConstant(
6893 object_,
6894 index,
6895 sizeof(value),
6896 &value),
6897 __SET_PROGRAM_SPECIALIZATION_CONSTANT_ERR);
6898 }
6899
6904 cl_int setSpecializationConstant(cl_uint index, size_type size, const void* value)
6905 {
6906 return detail::errHandler(
6907 ::clSetProgramSpecializationConstant(
6908 object_,
6909 index,
6910 size,
6911 value),
6912 __SET_PROGRAM_SPECIALIZATION_CONSTANT_ERR);
6913 }
6914#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
6915};
6916
6917#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6918inline Program linkProgram(
6919 Program input1,
6920 Program input2,
6921 const char* options = NULL,
6922 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
6923 void* data = NULL,
6924 cl_int* err = NULL)
6925{
6926 cl_int error_local = CL_SUCCESS;
6927
6928 cl_program programs[2] = { input1(), input2() };
6929
6930 Context ctx = input1.getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_CONTEXT>(&error_local);
6931 if(error_local!=CL_SUCCESS) {
6932 detail::errHandler(error_local, __LINK_PROGRAM_ERR);
6933 }
6934
6935 cl_program prog = ::clLinkProgram(
6936 ctx(),
6937 0,
6938 NULL,
6939 options,
6940 2,
6941 programs,
6942 notifyFptr,
6943 data,
6944 &error_local);
6945
6946 detail::errHandler(error_local,__COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
6947 if (err != NULL) {
6948 *err = error_local;
6949 }
6950
6951 return Program(prog);
6952}
6953
6954inline Program linkProgram(
6955 vector<Program> inputPrograms,
6956 const char* options = NULL,
6957 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
6958 void* data = NULL,
6959 cl_int* err = NULL)
6960{
6961 cl_int error_local = CL_SUCCESS;
6962
6963 vector<cl_program> programs(inputPrograms.size());
6964
6965 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inputPrograms.size(); i++) {
6966 programs[i] = inputPrograms[i]();
6967 }
6968
6969 Context ctx;
6970 if(inputPrograms.size() > 0) {
6971 ctx = inputPrograms[0].getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_CONTEXT>(&error_local);
6972 if(error_local!=CL_SUCCESS) {
6973 detail::errHandler(error_local, __LINK_PROGRAM_ERR);
6974 }
6975 }
6976 cl_program prog = ::clLinkProgram(
6977 ctx(),
6978 0,
6979 NULL,
6980 options,
6981 (cl_uint)inputPrograms.size(),
6982 programs.data(),
6983 notifyFptr,
6984 data,
6985 &error_local);
6986
6987 detail::errHandler(error_local,__COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
6988 if (err != NULL) {
6989 *err = error_local;
6990 }
6991
6992 return Program(prog, false);
6993}
6994#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6995
6996// Template specialization for CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES
6997template <>
6998inline cl_int cl::Program::getInfo(cl_program_info name, vector<vector<unsigned char>>* param) const
6999{
7000 if (name != CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES) {
7001 return CL_INVALID_VALUE;
7002 }
7003 if (param) {
7004 // Resize the parameter array appropriately for each allocation
7005 // and pass down to the helper
7006
7007 vector<size_type> sizes = getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARY_SIZES>();
7008 size_type numBinaries = sizes.size();
7009
7010 // Resize the parameter array and constituent arrays
7011 param->resize(numBinaries);
7012 for (size_type i = 0; i < numBinaries; ++i) {
7013 (*param)[i].resize(sizes[i]);
7014 }
7015
7016 return detail::errHandler(
7017 detail::getInfo(&::clGetProgramInfo, object_, name, param),
7018 __GET_PROGRAM_INFO_ERR);
7019 }
7020
7021 return CL_SUCCESS;
7022}
7023
7024template<>
7025inline vector<vector<unsigned char>> cl::Program::getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES>(cl_int* err) const
7026{
7027 vector<vector<unsigned char>> binariesVectors;
7028
7029 cl_int result = getInfo(CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES, &binariesVectors);
7030 if (err != NULL) {
7031 *err = result;
7032 }
7033 return binariesVectors;
7034}
7035
7036#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
7037// Template specialization for clSetProgramSpecializationConstant
7038template <>
7039inline cl_int cl::Program::setSpecializationConstant(cl_uint index, const bool &value)
7040{
7041 cl_uchar ucValue = value ? CL_UCHAR_MAX : 0;
7042 return detail::errHandler(
7043 ::clSetProgramSpecializationConstant(
7044 object_,
7045 index,
7046 sizeof(ucValue),
7047 &ucValue),
7048 __SET_PROGRAM_SPECIALIZATION_CONSTANT_ERR);
7049}
7050#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
7051
7052inline Kernel::Kernel(const Program& program, const char* name, cl_int* err)
7053{
7054 cl_int error;
7055
7056 object_ = ::clCreateKernel(program(), name, &error);
7057 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_KERNEL_ERR);
7058
7059 if (err != NULL) {
7060 *err = error;
7061 }
7062
7063}
7064
7065enum class QueueProperties : cl_command_queue_properties
7066{
7067 None = 0,
7068 Profiling = CL_QUEUE_PROFILING_ENABLE,
7069 OutOfOrder = CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE,
7070};
7071
7072inline QueueProperties operator|(QueueProperties lhs, QueueProperties rhs)
7073{
7074 return static_cast<QueueProperties>(static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(lhs) | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(rhs));
7075}
7076
7080class CommandQueue : public detail::Wrapper<cl_command_queue>
7081{
7082private:
7083 static std::once_flag default_initialized_;
7084 static CommandQueue default_;
7085 static cl_int default_error_;
7086
7092 static void makeDefault()
7093 {
7094 /* We don't want to throw an error from this function, so we have to
7095 * catch and set the error flag.
7096 */
7097#if defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
7098 try
7099#endif
7100 {
7101 int error;
7102 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
7103
7104 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
7105 default_error_ = error;
7106 }
7107 else {
7108 Device device = Device::getDefault();
7109 default_ = CommandQueue(context, device, 0, &default_error_);
7110 }
7111 }
7112#if defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
7113 catch (cl::Error &e) {
7114 default_error_ = e.err();
7115 }
7116#endif
7117 }
7118
7124 static void makeDefaultProvided(const CommandQueue &c) {
7125 default_ = c;
7126 }
7127
7128public:
7129#ifdef CL_HPP_UNIT_TEST_ENABLE
7136 static void unitTestClearDefault() {
7137 default_ = CommandQueue();
7138 }
7139#endif // #ifdef CL_HPP_UNIT_TEST_ENABLE
7140
7141
7146 CommandQueue(
7147 cl_command_queue_properties properties,
7148 cl_int* err = NULL)
7149 {
7150 cl_int error;
7151
7152 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
7153 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7154
7155 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
7156 if (err != NULL) {
7157 *err = error;
7158 }
7159 }
7160 else {
7161 Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
7162 bool useWithProperties;
7163
7164#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7165 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7166 {
7167 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7168 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7169 }
7170#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7171 useWithProperties = true;
7172#else
7173 useWithProperties = false;
7174#endif
7175
7176#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7177 if (useWithProperties) {
7178 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7179 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties, 0 };
7180 if ((properties & CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE) == 0) {
7181 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7182 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7183 }
7184 else {
7185 error = CL_INVALID_QUEUE_PROPERTIES;
7186 }
7187
7188 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7189 if (err != NULL) {
7190 *err = error;
7191 }
7192 }
7193#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7194#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7195 if (!useWithProperties) {
7196 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7197 context(), device(), properties, &error);
7198
7199 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7200 if (err != NULL) {
7201 *err = error;
7202 }
7203 }
7204#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7205 }
7206 }
7207
7212 CommandQueue(
7213 QueueProperties properties,
7214 cl_int* err = NULL)
7215 {
7216 cl_int error;
7217
7218 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
7219 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7220
7221 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
7222 if (err != NULL) {
7223 *err = error;
7224 }
7225 }
7226 else {
7227 Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
7228 bool useWithProperties;
7229
7230#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7231 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7232 {
7233 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7234 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7235 }
7236#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7237 useWithProperties = true;
7238#else
7239 useWithProperties = false;
7240#endif
7241
7242#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7243 if (useWithProperties) {
7244 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7245 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, static_cast<cl_queue_properties>(properties), 0 };
7246
7247 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7248 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7249
7250 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7251 if (err != NULL) {
7252 *err = error;
7253 }
7254 }
7255#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7256#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7257 if (!useWithProperties) {
7258 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7259 context(), device(), static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties), &error);
7260
7261 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7262 if (err != NULL) {
7263 *err = error;
7264 }
7265 }
7266#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7267
7268 }
7269 }
7270
7275 explicit CommandQueue(
7276 const Context& context,
7277 cl_command_queue_properties properties = 0,
7278 cl_int* err = NULL)
7279 {
7280 cl_int error;
7281 bool useWithProperties;
7282 vector<cl::Device> devices;
7283 error = context.getInfo(CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, &devices);
7284
7285 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7286
7287 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
7288 {
7289 if (err != NULL) {
7290 *err = error;
7291 }
7292 return;
7293 }
7294
7295#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7296 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7297 {
7298 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7299 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7300 }
7301#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7302 useWithProperties = true;
7303#else
7304 useWithProperties = false;
7305#endif
7306
7307#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7308 if (useWithProperties) {
7309 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7310 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties, 0 };
7311 if ((properties & CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE) == 0) {
7312 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7313 context(), devices[0](), queue_properties, &error);
7314 }
7315 else {
7316 error = CL_INVALID_QUEUE_PROPERTIES;
7317 }
7318
7319 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7320 if (err != NULL) {
7321 *err = error;
7322 }
7323 }
7324#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7325#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7326 if (!useWithProperties) {
7327 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7328 context(), devices[0](), properties, &error);
7329
7330 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7331 if (err != NULL) {
7332 *err = error;
7333 }
7334 }
7335#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7336 }
7337
7342 explicit CommandQueue(
7343 const Context& context,
7344 QueueProperties properties,
7345 cl_int* err = NULL)
7346 {
7347 cl_int error;
7348 bool useWithProperties;
7349 vector<cl::Device> devices;
7350 error = context.getInfo(CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, &devices);
7351
7352 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7353
7354 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
7355 {
7356 if (err != NULL) {
7357 *err = error;
7358 }
7359 return;
7360 }
7361
7362#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7363 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7364 {
7365 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7366 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7367 }
7368#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7369 useWithProperties = true;
7370#else
7371 useWithProperties = false;
7372#endif
7373
7374#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7375 if (useWithProperties) {
7376 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7377 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, static_cast<cl_queue_properties>(properties), 0 };
7378 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7379 context(), devices[0](), queue_properties, &error);
7380
7381 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7382 if (err != NULL) {
7383 *err = error;
7384 }
7385 }
7386#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7387#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7388 if (!useWithProperties) {
7389 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7390 context(), devices[0](), static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties), &error);
7391
7392 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7393 if (err != NULL) {
7394 *err = error;
7395 }
7396 }
7397#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7398 }
7399
7404 CommandQueue(
7405 const Context& context,
7406 const Device& device,
7407 cl_command_queue_properties properties = 0,
7408 cl_int* err = NULL)
7409 {
7410 cl_int error;
7411 bool useWithProperties;
7412
7413#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7414 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7415 {
7416 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7417 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7418 }
7419#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7420 useWithProperties = true;
7421#else
7422 useWithProperties = false;
7423#endif
7424
7425#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7426 if (useWithProperties) {
7427 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7428 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties, 0 };
7429 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7430 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7431
7432 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7433 if (err != NULL) {
7434 *err = error;
7435 }
7436 }
7437#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7438#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7439 if (!useWithProperties) {
7440 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7441 context(), device(), properties, &error);
7442
7443 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7444 if (err != NULL) {
7445 *err = error;
7446 }
7447 }
7448#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7449 }
7450
7455 CommandQueue(
7456 const Context& context,
7457 const Device& device,
7458 QueueProperties properties,
7459 cl_int* err = NULL)
7460 {
7461 cl_int error;
7462 bool useWithProperties;
7463
7464#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7465 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7466 {
7467 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7468 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7469 }
7470#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7471 useWithProperties = true;
7472#else
7473 useWithProperties = false;
7474#endif
7475
7476#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7477 if (useWithProperties) {
7478 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7479 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, static_cast<cl_queue_properties>(properties), 0 };
7480 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7481 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7482
7483 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7484 if (err != NULL) {
7485 *err = error;
7486 }
7487 }
7488#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7489#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7490 if (!useWithProperties) {
7491 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7492 context(), device(), static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties), &error);
7493
7494 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7495 if (err != NULL) {
7496 *err = error;
7497 }
7498 }
7499#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7500 }
7501
7502 static CommandQueue getDefault(cl_int * err = NULL)
7503 {
7504 std::call_once(default_initialized_, makeDefault);
7505#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7506 detail::errHandler(default_error_, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7507#else // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7508 detail::errHandler(default_error_, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7509#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7510 if (err != NULL) {
7511 *err = default_error_;
7512 }
7513 return default_;
7514 }
7515
7523 static CommandQueue setDefault(const CommandQueue &default_queue)
7524 {
7525 std::call_once(default_initialized_, makeDefaultProvided, std::cref(default_queue));
7526 detail::errHandler(default_error_);
7527 return default_;
7528 }
7529
7530 CommandQueue() { }
7531
7532
7539 explicit CommandQueue(const cl_command_queue& commandQueue, bool retainObject = false) :
7540 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandQueue, retainObject) { }
7541
7542 CommandQueue& operator = (const cl_command_queue& rhs)
7543 {
7544 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
7545 return *this;
7546 }
7547
7551 CommandQueue(const CommandQueue& queue) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(queue) {}
7552
7556 CommandQueue& operator = (const CommandQueue &queue)
7557 {
7558 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(queue);
7559 return *this;
7560 }
7561
7565 CommandQueue(CommandQueue&& queue) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(queue)) {}
7566
7570 CommandQueue& operator = (CommandQueue &&queue)
7571 {
7572 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(queue));
7573 return *this;
7574 }
7575
7576 template <typename T>
7577 cl_int getInfo(cl_command_queue_info name, T* param) const
7578 {
7579 return detail::errHandler(
7580 detail::getInfo(
7581 &::clGetCommandQueueInfo, object_, name, param),
7582 __GET_COMMAND_QUEUE_INFO_ERR);
7583 }
7584
7585 template <cl_command_queue_info name> typename
7586 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type
7587 getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
7588 {
7589 typename detail::param_traits<
7590 detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type param;
7591 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
7592 if (err != NULL) {
7593 *err = result;
7594 }
7595 return param;
7596 }
7597
7598 cl_int enqueueReadBuffer(
7599 const Buffer& buffer,
7600 cl_bool blocking,
7601 size_type offset,
7602 size_type size,
7603 void* ptr,
7604 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7605 Event* event = NULL) const
7606 {
7607 cl_event tmp;
7608 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7609 ::clEnqueueReadBuffer(
7610 object_, buffer(), blocking, offset, size,
7611 ptr,
7612 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7613 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7614 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7615 __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_ERR);
7616
7617 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7618 *event = tmp;
7619
7620 return err;
7621 }
7622
7623 cl_int enqueueWriteBuffer(
7624 const Buffer& buffer,
7625 cl_bool blocking,
7626 size_type offset,
7627 size_type size,
7628 const void* ptr,
7629 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7630 Event* event = NULL) const
7631 {
7632 cl_event tmp;
7633 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7634 ::clEnqueueWriteBuffer(
7635 object_, buffer(), blocking, offset, size,
7636 ptr,
7637 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7638 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7639 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7640 __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_ERR);
7641
7642 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7643 *event = tmp;
7644
7645 return err;
7646 }
7647
7648 cl_int enqueueCopyBuffer(
7649 const Buffer& src,
7650 const Buffer& dst,
7651 size_type src_offset,
7652 size_type dst_offset,
7653 size_type size,
7654 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7655 Event* event = NULL) const
7656 {
7657 cl_event tmp;
7658 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7659 ::clEnqueueCopyBuffer(
7660 object_, src(), dst(), src_offset, dst_offset, size,
7661 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7662 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7663 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7664 __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_ERR);
7665
7666 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7667 *event = tmp;
7668
7669 return err;
7670 }
7671#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
7672 cl_int enqueueReadBufferRect(
7673 const Buffer& buffer,
7674 cl_bool blocking,
7675 const array<size_type, 3>& buffer_offset,
7676 const array<size_type, 3>& host_offset,
7677 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7678 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
7679 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
7680 size_type host_row_pitch,
7681 size_type host_slice_pitch,
7682 void *ptr,
7683 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7684 Event* event = NULL) const
7685 {
7686 cl_event tmp;
7687 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7688 ::clEnqueueReadBufferRect(
7689 object_,
7690 buffer(),
7691 blocking,
7692 buffer_offset.data(),
7693 host_offset.data(),
7694 region.data(),
7695 buffer_row_pitch,
7696 buffer_slice_pitch,
7697 host_row_pitch,
7698 host_slice_pitch,
7699 ptr,
7700 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7701 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7702 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7703 __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_RECT_ERR);
7704
7705 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7706 *event = tmp;
7707
7708 return err;
7709 }
7710
7711 cl_int enqueueWriteBufferRect(
7712 const Buffer& buffer,
7713 cl_bool blocking,
7714 const array<size_type, 3>& buffer_offset,
7715 const array<size_type, 3>& host_offset,
7716 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7717 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
7718 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
7719 size_type host_row_pitch,
7720 size_type host_slice_pitch,
7721 const void *ptr,
7722 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7723 Event* event = NULL) const
7724 {
7725 cl_event tmp;
7726 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7727 ::clEnqueueWriteBufferRect(
7728 object_,
7729 buffer(),
7730 blocking,
7731 buffer_offset.data(),
7732 host_offset.data(),
7733 region.data(),
7734 buffer_row_pitch,
7735 buffer_slice_pitch,
7736 host_row_pitch,
7737 host_slice_pitch,
7738 ptr,
7739 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7740 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7741 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7742 __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_RECT_ERR);
7743
7744 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7745 *event = tmp;
7746
7747 return err;
7748 }
7749
7750 cl_int enqueueCopyBufferRect(
7751 const Buffer& src,
7752 const Buffer& dst,
7753 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
7754 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
7755 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7756 size_type src_row_pitch,
7757 size_type src_slice_pitch,
7758 size_type dst_row_pitch,
7759 size_type dst_slice_pitch,
7760 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7761 Event* event = NULL) const
7762 {
7763 cl_event tmp;
7764 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7765 ::clEnqueueCopyBufferRect(
7766 object_,
7767 src(),
7768 dst(),
7769 src_origin.data(),
7770 dst_origin.data(),
7771 region.data(),
7772 src_row_pitch,
7773 src_slice_pitch,
7774 dst_row_pitch,
7775 dst_slice_pitch,
7776 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7777 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7778 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7779 __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_RECT_ERR);
7780
7781 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7782 *event = tmp;
7783
7784 return err;
7785 }
7786#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
7787#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
7799 template<typename PatternType>
7800 cl_int enqueueFillBuffer(
7801 const Buffer& buffer,
7802 PatternType pattern,
7803 size_type offset,
7804 size_type size,
7805 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7806 Event* event = NULL) const
7807 {
7808 cl_event tmp;
7809 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7810 ::clEnqueueFillBuffer(
7811 object_,
7812 buffer(),
7813 static_cast<void*>(&pattern),
7814 sizeof(PatternType),
7815 offset,
7816 size,
7817 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7818 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7819 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7820 __ENQUEUE_FILL_BUFFER_ERR);
7821
7822 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7823 *event = tmp;
7824
7825 return err;
7826 }
7827#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120

7829 cl_int enqueueReadImage(
7830 const Image& image,
7831 cl_bool blocking,
7832 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
7833 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7834 size_type row_pitch,
7835 size_type slice_pitch,
7836 void* ptr,
7837 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7838 Event* event = NULL) const
7839 {
7840 cl_event tmp;
7841 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7842 ::clEnqueueReadImage(
7843 object_,
7844 image(),
7845 blocking,
7846 origin.data(),
7847 region.data(),
7848 row_pitch,
7849 slice_pitch,
7850 ptr,
7851 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7852 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7853 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7854 __ENQUEUE_READ_IMAGE_ERR);
7855
7856 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7857 *event = tmp;
7858
7859 return err;
7860 }

7863 const Image& image,
7864 cl_bool blocking,
7865 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
7866 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7867 size_type row_pitch,
7868 size_type slice_pitch,

7880 region.data(),

7882 slice_pitch,
7883 ptr,
7884 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7885 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7886 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7887 __ENQUEUE_WRITE_IMAGE_ERR);

7896 const Image& src,
7897 const Image& dst,
7898 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
7899 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
7900 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7901 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
7902 Event* event = NULL) const
7903 {
7904 cl_event tmp;
7905 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7906 ::clEnqueueCopyImage(
7907 object_,
7908 src(),
7909 dst(),
7910 src_origin.data(),
7911 dst_origin.data(),
7912 region.data(),
7913 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7914 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
7915 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
7916 __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_ERR);
7917
7918 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7919 *event = tmp;
7920
7921 return err;
7922 }

8040 object_,
8041 src(),
8042 dst(),

8044 region.data(),
8045 dst_offset,
8046 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8047 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8048 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8049 __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_ERR);
8050
8051 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8052 *event = tmp;
8053
8054 return err;
8055 }
8056
8057 cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
8058 const Buffer& src,
8059 const Image& dst,
8060 size_type src_offset,
8061 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
8062 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
8063 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8064 Event* event = NULL) const
8065 {
8066 cl_event tmp;
8067 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8068 ::clEnqueueCopyBufferToImage(
8069 object_,
8070 src(),
8071 dst(),
8072 src_offset,
8073 dst_origin.data(),
8074 region.data(),
8075 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8076 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8077 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8078 __ENQUEUE_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_ERR);
8079
8080 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8081 *event = tmp;
8082
8083 return err;
8084 }
8085
8086 void* enqueueMapBuffer(
8087 const Buffer& buffer,
8088 cl_bool blocking,
8089 cl_map_flags flags,
8090 size_type offset,
8091 size_type size,
8092 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8093 Event* event = NULL,
8094 cl_int* err = NULL) const
8095 {
8096 cl_event tmp;
8097 cl_int error;
8098 void * result = ::clEnqueueMapBuffer(
8099 object_, buffer(), blocking, flags, offset, size,
8100 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8101 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8102 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL,
8103 &error);
8104
8105 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8106 if (err != NULL) {
8107 *err = error;
8108 }
8109 if (event != NULL && error == CL_SUCCESS)
8110 *event = tmp;
8111
8112 return result;
8113 }
8114
8115 void* enqueueMapImage(
8116 const Image& buffer,
8117 cl_bool blocking,
8118 cl_map_flags flags,
8119 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
8120 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
8121 size_type * row_pitch,
8122 size_type * slice_pitch,
8123 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8124 Event* event = NULL,
8125 cl_int* err = NULL) const
8126 {
8127 cl_event tmp;
8128 cl_int error;
8129 void * result = ::clEnqueueMapImage(
8130 object_, buffer(), blocking, flags,
8131 origin.data(),
8132 region.data(),
8133 row_pitch, slice_pitch,
8134 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8135 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8136 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL,
8137 &error);
8138
8139 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_IMAGE_ERR);
8140 if (err != NULL) {
8141 *err = error;
8142 }
8143 if (event != NULL && error == CL_SUCCESS)
8144 *event = tmp;
8145 return result;
8146 }
8147
8148#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
8153 template<typename T>
8154 cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
8155 T* ptr,
8156 cl_bool blocking,
8157 cl_map_flags flags,
8158 size_type size,
8159 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8160 Event* event = NULL) const
8161 {
8162 cl_event tmp;
8163 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMap(
8164 object_, blocking, flags, static_cast<void*>(ptr), size,
8165 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8166 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : NULL,
8167 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8168 __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8169
8170 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8171 *event = tmp;
8172
8173 return err;
8174 }
8175
8176
8181 template<typename T, class D>
8182 cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
8183 cl::pointer<T, D> &ptr,
8184 cl_bool blocking,
8185 cl_map_flags flags,
8186 size_type size,
8187 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8188 Event* event = NULL) const
8189 {
8190 cl_event tmp;
8191 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMap(
8192 object_, blocking, flags, static_cast<void*>(ptr.get()), size,
8193 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8194 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : NULL,
8195 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8196 __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8197
8198 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8199 *event = tmp;
8200
8201 return err;
8202 }
8203
8208 template<typename T, class Alloc>
8209 cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
8210 cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container,
8211 cl_bool blocking,
8212 cl_map_flags flags,
8213 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8214 Event* event = NULL) const
8215 {
8216 cl_event tmp;
8217 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMap(
8218 object_, blocking, flags, static_cast<void*>(container.data()), container.size()*sizeof(T),
8219 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8220 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : NULL,
8221 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8222 __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8223
8224 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8225 *event = tmp;
8226
8227 return err;
8228 }
8229#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
