8233 void* mapped_ptr,
8234 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8235 Event* event = NULL) const
8236 {
8237 cl_event tmp;
8238 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8239 ::clEnqueueUnmapMemObject(
8240 object_, memory(), mapped_ptr,
8241 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8242 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8243 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8244 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
8245
8246 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8247 *event = tmp;
8248
8249 return err;
8250 }

8272

8318 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,

8329
8330#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8342 cl_int enqueueMarkerWithWaitList(
8343 const vector<Event> *events = 0,
8344 Event *event = 0) const
8345 {
8346 cl_event tmp;
8347 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8348 ::clEnqueueMarkerWithWaitList(
8349 object_,
8350 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8351 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8352 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8353 __ENQUEUE_MARKER_WAIT_LIST_ERR);
8354
8355 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8356 *event = tmp;
8357
8358 return err;
8359 }
8360
8372 cl_int enqueueBarrierWithWaitList(
8373 const vector<Event> *events = 0,
8374 Event *event = 0) const
8375 {
8376 cl_event tmp;
8377 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8378 ::clEnqueueBarrierWithWaitList(
8379 object_,
8380 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8381 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8382 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8383 __ENQUEUE_BARRIER_WAIT_LIST_ERR);
8384
8385 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8386 *event = tmp;
8387
8388 return err;
8389 }
8390
8395 cl_int enqueueMigrateMemObjects(
8396 const vector<Memory> &memObjects,
8397 cl_mem_migration_flags flags,
8398 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8399 Event* event = NULL
8400 ) const
8401 {
8402 cl_event tmp;
8403
8404 vector<cl_mem> localMemObjects(memObjects.size());
8405
8406 for( int i = 0; i < (int)memObjects.size(); ++i ) {
8407 localMemObjects[i] = memObjects[i]();
8408 }
8409
8410 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8411 ::clEnqueueMigrateMemObjects(
8412 object_,
8413 (cl_uint)memObjects.size(),
8414 localMemObjects.data(),
8415 flags,
8416 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8417 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8418 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8419 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
8420
8421 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8422 *event = tmp;
8423
8424 return err;
8425 }
8426#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8427
8428
8429#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
8435 template<typename T>
8436 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8437 const cl::vector<T*> &svmRawPointers,
8438 const cl::vector<size_type> &sizes,
8439 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8440 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8441 Event* event = NULL) const
8442 {
8443 cl_event tmp;
8444 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMigrateMem(
8445 object_,
8446 svmRawPointers.size(), static_cast<void**>(svmRawPointers.data()),
8447 sizes.data(), // array of sizes not passed
8448 flags,
8449 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8450 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : NULL,
8451 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8452 __ENQUEUE_MIGRATE_SVM_ERR);
8453
8454 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8455 *event = tmp;
8456
8457 return err;
8458 }
8459
8464 template<typename T>
8465 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8466 const cl::vector<T*> &svmRawPointers,
8467 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8468 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8469 Event* event = NULL) const
8470 {
8471 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmRawPointers, cl::vector<size_type>(svmRawPointers.size()), flags, events, event);
8472 }
8473
8474
8480 template<typename T, class D>
8481 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8482 const cl::vector<cl::pointer<T, D>> &svmPointers,
8483 const cl::vector<size_type> &sizes,
8484 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8485 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8486 Event* event = NULL) const
8487 {
8488 cl::vector<void*> svmRawPointers;
8489 svmRawPointers.reserve(svmPointers.size());
8490 for (auto p : svmPointers) {
8491 svmRawPointers.push_back(static_cast<void*>(p.get()));
8492 }
8493
8494 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmRawPointers, sizes, flags, events, event);
8495 }
8496
8497
8502 template<typename T, class D>
8503 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8504 const cl::vector<cl::pointer<T, D>> &svmPointers,
8505 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8506 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8507 Event* event = NULL) const
8508 {
8509 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmPointers, cl::vector<size_type>(svmPointers.size()), flags, events, event);
8510 }
8511
8517 template<typename T, class Alloc>
8518 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8519 const cl::vector<cl::vector<T, Alloc>> &svmContainers,
8520 const cl::vector<size_type> &sizes,
8521 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8522 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8523 Event* event = NULL) const
8524 {
8525 cl::vector<void*> svmRawPointers;
8526 svmRawPointers.reserve(svmContainers.size());
8527 for (auto p : svmContainers) {
8528 svmRawPointers.push_back(static_cast<void*>(p.data()));
8529 }
8530
8531 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmRawPointers, sizes, flags, events, event);
8532 }
8533
8538 template<typename T, class Alloc>
8539 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8540 const cl::vector<cl::vector<T, Alloc>> &svmContainers,
8541 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8542 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8543 Event* event = NULL) const
8544 {
8545 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmContainers, cl::vector<size_type>(svmContainers.size()), flags, events, event);
8546 }
8547
8548#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
8549
8550 cl_int enqueueNDRangeKernel(
8551 const Kernel& kernel,
8552 const NDRange& offset,
8553 const NDRange& global,
8554 const NDRange& local = NullRange,
8555 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8556 Event* event = NULL) const
8557 {
8558 cl_event tmp;
8559 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8560 ::clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(
8561 object_, kernel(), (cl_uint) global.dimensions(),
8562 offset.dimensions() != 0 ? (const size_type*) offset : NULL,
8563 (const size_type*) global,
8564 local.dimensions() != 0 ? (const size_type*) local : NULL,
8565 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8566 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8567 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8568 __ENQUEUE_NDRANGE_KERNEL_ERR);
8569
8570 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8571 *event = tmp;
8572
8573 return err;
8574 }
8575
8576#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_2_APIS)
8577 CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_2_DEPRECATED cl_int enqueueTask(
8578 const Kernel& kernel,
8579 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8580 Event* event = NULL) const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_2_DEPRECATED
8581 {
8582 cl_event tmp;
8583 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8584 ::clEnqueueTask(
8585 object_, kernel(),
8586 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8587 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8588 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8589 __ENQUEUE_TASK_ERR);
8590
8591 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8592 *event = tmp;
8593
8594 return err;
8595 }
8596#endif // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_2_APIS)
8597
8598 cl_int enqueueNativeKernel(
8599 void (CL_CALLBACK *userFptr)(void *),
8600 std::pair<void*, size_type> args,
8601 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
8602 const vector<const void*>* mem_locs = NULL,
8603 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8604 Event* event = NULL) const
8605 {
8606 size_type elements = 0;
8607 if (mem_objects != NULL) {
8608 elements = mem_objects->size();
8609 }
8610 vector<cl_mem> mems(elements);
8611 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < elements; i++) {
8612 mems[i] = ((*mem_objects)[i])();
8613 }
8614
8615 cl_event tmp;
8616 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8617 ::clEnqueueNativeKernel(
8618 object_, userFptr, args.first, args.second,
8619 (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8620 mems.data(),
8621 (mem_locs != NULL && mem_locs->size() > 0) ? (const void **) &mem_locs->front() : NULL,
8622 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8623 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8624 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8625 __ENQUEUE_NATIVE_KERNEL);
8626
8627 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8628 *event = tmp;
8629
8630 return err;
8631 }
8632
8636#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
8637 CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8638 cl_int enqueueMarker(Event* event = NULL) const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8639 {
8640 cl_event tmp;
8641 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8642 ::clEnqueueMarker(
8643 object_,
8644 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8645 __ENQUEUE_MARKER_ERR);
8646
8647 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8648 *event = tmp;
8649
8650 return err;
8651 }
8652
8653 CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8654 cl_int enqueueWaitForEvents(const vector<Event>& events) const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8655 {
8656 return detail::errHandler(
8657 ::clEnqueueWaitForEvents(
8658 object_,
8659 (cl_uint) events.size(),
8660 events.size() > 0 ? (const cl_event*) &events.front() : NULL),
8661 __ENQUEUE_WAIT_FOR_EVENTS_ERR);
8662 }
8663#endif // defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
8664
8665 cl_int enqueueAcquireGLObjects(
8666 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
8667 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8668 Event* event = NULL) const
8669 {
8670 cl_event tmp;
8671 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8672 ::clEnqueueAcquireGLObjects(
8673 object_,
8674 (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8675 (mem_objects != NULL && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
8676 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8677 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8678 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8679 __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_GL_ERR);
8680
8681 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8682 *event = tmp;
8683
8684 return err;
8685 }
8686
8687 cl_int enqueueReleaseGLObjects(
8688 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
8689 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8690 Event* event = NULL) const
8691 {
8692 cl_event tmp;
8693 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8694 ::clEnqueueReleaseGLObjects(
8695 object_,
8696 (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8697 (mem_objects != NULL && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
8698 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8699 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8700 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8701 __ENQUEUE_RELEASE_GL_ERR);
8702
8703 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8704 *event = tmp;
8705
8706 return err;
8707 }
8708
8709#if defined (CL_HPP_USE_DX_INTEROP)
8710typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR)(
8711 cl_command_queue command_queue, cl_uint num_objects,
8712 const cl_mem* mem_objects, cl_uint num_events_in_wait_list,
8713 const cl_event* event_wait_list, cl_event* event);
8714typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR)(
8715 cl_command_queue command_queue, cl_uint num_objects,
8716 const cl_mem* mem_objects, cl_uint num_events_in_wait_list,
8717 const cl_event* event_wait_list, cl_event* event);
8718
8719 cl_int enqueueAcquireD3D10Objects(
8720 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
8721 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8722 Event* event = NULL) const
8723 {
8724 static PFN_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR pfn_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR = NULL;
8725#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8726 cl_context context = getInfo<CL_QUEUE_CONTEXT>();
8727 cl::Device device(getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>());
8728 cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>();
8729 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8730#endif
8731#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
8732 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8733#endif
8734
8735 cl_event tmp;
8736 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8737 pfn_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR(
8738 object_,
8739 (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8740 (mem_objects != NULL && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
8741 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8742 (events != NULL) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8743 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8744 __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_GL_ERR);
8745
8746 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8747 *event = tmp;
8748
8749 return err;
8750 }
8751
8752 cl_int enqueueReleaseD3D10Objects(
8753 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
8754 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
8755 Event* event = NULL) const
8756 {
8757 static PFN_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR pfn_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR = NULL;
8758#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8759 cl_context context = getInfo<CL_QUEUE_CONTEXT>();
8760 cl::Device device(getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>());
8761 cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>();
8762 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8763#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8764#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
8765 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8766#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
8767
8768 cl_event tmp;
8769 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8770 pfn_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR(
8771 object_,
8772 (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8773 (mem_objects != NULL && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
8774 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8775 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
8776 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
8777 __ENQUEUE_RELEASE_GL_ERR);
8778
8779 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8780 *event = tmp;
8781
8782 return err;
8783 }
8784#endif
8785
8789#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
8790 CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8791 cl_int enqueueBarrier() const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8792 {
8793 return detail::errHandler(
8794 ::clEnqueueBarrier(object_),
8795 __ENQUEUE_BARRIER_ERR);
8796 }
8797#endif // CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS
8798
8799 cl_int flush() const
8800 {
8801 return detail::errHandler(::clFlush(object_), __FLUSH_ERR);
8802 }
8803
8804 cl_int finish() const
8805 {
8806 return detail::errHandler(::clFinish(object_), __FINISH_ERR);
8807 }
8808}; // CommandQueue
8809
8810CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ std::once_flag CommandQueue::default_initialized_;
8811CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ CommandQueue CommandQueue::default_;
8812CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ cl_int CommandQueue::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
8813
8814
8815#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
8816enum class DeviceQueueProperties : cl_command_queue_properties
8817{
8818 None = 0,
8819 Profiling = CL_QUEUE_PROFILING_ENABLE,
8820};
8821
8822inline DeviceQueueProperties operator|(DeviceQueueProperties lhs, DeviceQueueProperties rhs)
8823{
8824 return static_cast<DeviceQueueProperties>(static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(lhs) | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(rhs));
8825}
8826
8830class DeviceCommandQueue : public detail::Wrapper<cl_command_queue>
8831{
8832public:
8833
8837 DeviceCommandQueue() { }
8838
8842 DeviceCommandQueue(DeviceQueueProperties properties, cl_int* err = NULL)
8843 {
8844 cl_int error;
8845 cl::Context context = cl::Context::getDefault();
8846 cl::Device device = cl::Device::getDefault();
8847
8848 cl_command_queue_properties mergedProperties =
8849 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties);
8850
8851 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8852 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, mergedProperties, 0 };
8853 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
8854 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
8855
8856 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
8857 if (err != NULL) {
8858 *err = error;
8859 }
8860 }
8861
8865 DeviceCommandQueue(
8866 const Context& context,
8867 const Device& device,
8868 DeviceQueueProperties properties = DeviceQueueProperties::None,
8869 cl_int* err = NULL)
8870 {
8871 cl_int error;
8872
8873 cl_command_queue_properties mergedProperties =
8874 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties);
8875 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8876 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, mergedProperties, 0 };
8877 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
8878 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
8879
8880 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
8881 if (err != NULL) {
8882 *err = error;
8883 }
8884 }
8885
8889 DeviceCommandQueue(
8890 const Context& context,
8891 const Device& device,
8892 cl_uint queueSize,
8893 DeviceQueueProperties properties = DeviceQueueProperties::None,
8894 cl_int* err = NULL)
8895 {
8896 cl_int error;
8897
8898 cl_command_queue_properties mergedProperties =
8899 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties);
8900 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8901 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, mergedProperties,
8902 CL_QUEUE_SIZE, queueSize,
8903 0 };
8904 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
8905 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
8906
8907 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
8908 if (err != NULL) {
8909 *err = error;
8910 }
8911 }
8912
8919 explicit DeviceCommandQueue(const cl_command_queue& commandQueue, bool retainObject = false) :
8920 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandQueue, retainObject) { }
8921
8922 DeviceCommandQueue& operator = (const cl_command_queue& rhs)
8923 {
8924 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
8925 return *this;
8926 }
8927
8931 DeviceCommandQueue(const DeviceCommandQueue& queue) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(queue) {}
8932
8936 DeviceCommandQueue& operator = (const DeviceCommandQueue &queue)
8937 {
8938 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(queue);
8939 return *this;
8940 }
8941
8945 DeviceCommandQueue(DeviceCommandQueue&& queue) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT_ : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(queue)) {}
8946
8950 DeviceCommandQueue& operator = (DeviceCommandQueue &&queue)
8951 {
8952 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(queue));
8953 return *this;
8954 }
8955
8956 template <typename T>
8957 cl_int getInfo(cl_command_queue_info name, T* param) const
8958 {
8959 return detail::errHandler(
8960 detail::getInfo(
8961 &::clGetCommandQueueInfo, object_, name, param),
8962 __GET_COMMAND_QUEUE_INFO_ERR);
8963 }
8964
8965 template <cl_command_queue_info name> typename
8966 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type
8967 getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
8968 {
8969 typename detail::param_traits<
8970 detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type param;
8971 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
8972 if (err != NULL) {
8973 *err = result;
8974 }
8975 return param;
8976 }
8977
8984 static DeviceCommandQueue makeDefault(
8985 cl_int *err = nullptr)
8986 {
8987 cl_int error;
8988 cl::Context context = cl::Context::getDefault();
8989 cl::Device device = cl::Device::getDefault();
8990
8991 cl_command_queue_properties properties =
8992 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE_DEFAULT;
8993 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8994 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties,
8995 0 };
8996 DeviceCommandQueue deviceQueue(
8997 ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
8998 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error));
8999
9000 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9001 if (err != NULL) {
9002 *err = error;
9003 }
9004
9005 return deviceQueue;
9006 }
9007
9014 static DeviceCommandQueue makeDefault(
9015 const Context &context, const Device &device, cl_int *err = nullptr)
9016 {
9017 cl_int error;
9018
9019 cl_command_queue_properties properties =
9020 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE_DEFAULT;
9021 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
9022 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties,
9023 0 };
9024 DeviceCommandQueue deviceQueue(
9025 ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
9026 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error));
9027
9028 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9029 if (err != NULL) {
9030 *err = error;
9031 }
9032
9033 return deviceQueue;
9034 }
9035
9042 static DeviceCommandQueue makeDefault(
9043 const Context &context, const Device &device, cl_uint queueSize, cl_int *err = nullptr)
9044 {
9045 cl_int error;
9046
9047 cl_command_queue_properties properties =
9048 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE_DEFAULT;
9049 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
9050 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties,
9051 CL_QUEUE_SIZE, queueSize,
9052 0 };
9053 DeviceCommandQueue deviceQueue(
9054 ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
9055 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error));
9056
9057 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9058 if (err != NULL) {
9059 *err = error;
9060 }
9061
9062 return deviceQueue;
9063 }
9064
9065
9066
9067#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
9074 static DeviceCommandQueue updateDefault(const Context &context, const Device &device, const DeviceCommandQueue &default_queue, cl_int *err = nullptr)
9075 {
9076 cl_int error;
9077 error = clSetDefaultDeviceCommandQueue(context.get(), device.get(), default_queue.get());
9078
9079 detail::errHandler(error, __SET_DEFAULT_DEVICE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
9080 if (err != NULL) {
9081 *err = error;
9082 }
9083 return default_queue;
9084 }
9085
9089 static DeviceCommandQueue getDefault(const CommandQueue &queue, cl_int * err = NULL)
9090 {
9091 return queue.getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE_DEFAULT>(err);
9092 }
9093
9094#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
9095}; // DeviceCommandQueue
9096
9097namespace detail
9098{
9099 // Specialization for device command queue
9100 template <>
9101 struct KernelArgumentHandler<cl::DeviceCommandQueue, void>
9102 {
9103 static size_type size(const cl::DeviceCommandQueue&) { return sizeof(cl_command_queue); }
9104 static const cl_command_queue* ptr(const cl::DeviceCommandQueue& value) { return &(value()); }
9105 };
9106} // namespace detail
9107
9108#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9109
9110
9111template< typename IteratorType >
9112Buffer::Buffer(
9113 const Context &context,
9114 IteratorType startIterator,
9115 IteratorType endIterator,
9116 bool readOnly,
9117 bool useHostPtr,
9118 cl_int* err)
9119{
9120 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9121 cl_int error;
9122
9123 cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
9124 if( readOnly ) {
9125 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
9126 }
9127 else {
9128 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
9129 }
9130 if( useHostPtr ) {
9131 flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
9132 }
9133
9134 size_type size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
9135
9136 if( useHostPtr ) {
9137 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, static_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
9138 } else {
9139 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
9140 }
9141
9142 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9143 if (err != NULL) {
9144 *err = error;
9145 }
9146
9147 if( !useHostPtr ) {
9148 CommandQueue queue(context, 0, &error);
9149 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9150 if (err != NULL) {
9151 *err = error;
9152 }
9153
9154 error = cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, *this);
9155 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9156 if (err != NULL) {
9157 *err = error;
9158 }
9159 }
9160}
9161
9162template< typename IteratorType >
9163Buffer::Buffer(
9164 const CommandQueue &queue,
9165 IteratorType startIterator,
9166 IteratorType endIterator,
9167 bool readOnly,
9168 bool useHostPtr,
9169 cl_int* err)
9170{
9171 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9172 cl_int error;
9173
9174 cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
9175 if (readOnly) {
9176 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
9177 }
9178 else {
9179 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
9180 }
9181 if (useHostPtr) {
9182 flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
9183 }
9184
9185 size_type size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
9186
9187 Context context = queue.getInfo<CL_QUEUE_CONTEXT>();
9188
9189 if (useHostPtr) {
9190 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, static_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
9191 }
9192 else {
9193 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
9194 }
9195
9196 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9197 if (err != NULL) {
9198 *err = error;
9199 }
9200
9201 if (!useHostPtr) {
9202 error = cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, *this);
9203 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9204 if (err != NULL) {
9205 *err = error;
9206 }
9207 }
9208}
9209
9210inline cl_int enqueueReadBuffer(
9211 const Buffer& buffer,
9212 cl_bool blocking,
9213 size_type offset,
9214 size_type size,
9215 void* ptr,
9216 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9217 Event* event = NULL)
9218{
9219 cl_int error;
9220 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9221
9222 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9223 return error;
9224 }
9225
9226 return queue.enqueueReadBuffer(buffer, blocking, offset, size, ptr, events, event);
9227}
9228
9229inline cl_int enqueueWriteBuffer(
9230 const Buffer& buffer,
9231 cl_bool blocking,
9232 size_type offset,
9233 size_type size,
9234 const void* ptr,
9235 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9236 Event* event = NULL)
9237{
9238 cl_int error;
9239 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9240
9241 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9242 return error;
9243 }
9244
9245 return queue.enqueueWriteBuffer(buffer, blocking, offset, size, ptr, events, event);
9246}
9247
9248inline void* enqueueMapBuffer(
9249 const Buffer& buffer,
9250 cl_bool blocking,
9251 cl_map_flags flags,
9252 size_type offset,
9253 size_type size,
9254 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9255 Event* event = NULL,
9256 cl_int* err = NULL)
9257{
9258 cl_int error;
9259 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9260 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9261 if (err != NULL) {
9262 *err = error;
9263 }
9264
9265 void * result = ::clEnqueueMapBuffer(
9266 queue(), buffer(), blocking, flags, offset, size,
9267 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
9268 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
9269 (cl_event*) event,
9270 &error);
9271
9272 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9273 if (err != NULL) {
9274 *err = error;
9275 }
9276 return result;
9277}
9278
9279
9280#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9286template<typename T>
9287inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
9288 T* ptr,
9289 cl_bool blocking,
9290 cl_map_flags flags,
9291 size_type size,
9292 const vector<Event>* events,
9293 Event* event)
9294{
9295 cl_int error;
9296 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9297 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9298 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9299 }
9300
9301 return queue.enqueueMapSVM(
9302 ptr, blocking, flags, size, events, event);
9303}
9304
9310template<typename T, class D>
9311inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
9312 cl::pointer<T, D> ptr,
9313 cl_bool blocking,
9314 cl_map_flags flags,
9315 size_type size,
9316 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9317 Event* event = NULL)
9318{
9319 cl_int error;
9320 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9321 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9322 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9323 }
9324
9325 return queue.enqueueMapSVM(
9326 ptr, blocking, flags, size, events, event);
9327}
9328
9334template<typename T, class Alloc>
9335inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
9336 cl::vector<T, Alloc> container,
9337 cl_bool blocking,
9338 cl_map_flags flags,
9339 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9340 Event* event = NULL)
9341{
9342 cl_int error;
9343 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9344 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9345 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9346 }
9347
9348 return queue.enqueueMapSVM(
9349 container, blocking, flags, events, event);
9350}
9351
9352#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9353
9354inline cl_int enqueueUnmapMemObject(
9355 const Memory& memory,
9356 void* mapped_ptr,
9357 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9358 Event* event = NULL)
9359{
9360 cl_int error;
9361 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9362 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9363 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9364 return error;
9365 }
9366
9367 cl_event tmp;
9368 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
9369 ::clEnqueueUnmapMemObject(
9370 queue(), memory(), mapped_ptr,
9371 (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
9372 (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : NULL,
9373 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
9374 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9375
9376 if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
9377 *event = tmp;
9378
9379 return err;
9380}
9381
9382#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9388template<typename T>
9389inline cl_int enqueueUnmapSVM(
9390 T* ptr,
9391 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9392 Event* event = NULL)
9393{
9394 cl_int error;
9395 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9396 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9397 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9398 }
9399
9400 return detail::errHandler(queue.enqueueUnmapSVM(ptr, events, event),
9401 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9402
9403}
9404
9410template<typename T, class D>
9411inline cl_int enqueueUnmapSVM(
9412 cl::pointer<T, D> &ptr,
9413 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9414 Event* event = NULL)
9415{
9416 cl_int error;
9417 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9418 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9419 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9420 }
9421
9422 return detail::errHandler(queue.enqueueUnmapSVM(ptr, events, event),
9423 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9424}
9425

9445}

9447#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9448
9449inline cl_int enqueueCopyBuffer(
9450 const Buffer& src,
9451 const Buffer& dst,
9452 size_type src_offset,
9453 size_type dst_offset,
9454 size_type size,
9455 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9456 Event* event = NULL)
9457{
9458 cl_int error;
9459 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9460
9461 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9462 return error;
9463 }
9464
9465 return queue.enqueueCopyBuffer(src, dst, src_offset, dst_offset, size, events, event);
9466}
9467
9473template< typename IteratorType >
9474inline cl_int copy( IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer )
9475{
9476 cl_int error;
9477 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9478 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
9479 return error;
9480
9481 return cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, buffer);
9482}
9483
9489template< typename IteratorType >
9490inline cl_int copy( const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator )
9491{
9492 cl_int error;
9493 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9494 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
9495 return error;
9496
9497 return cl::copy(queue, buffer, startIterator, endIterator);
9498}
9499
9505template< typename IteratorType >
9506inline cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer )
9507{
9508 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9509 cl_int error;
9510
9511 size_type length = endIterator-startIterator;
9512 size_type byteLength = length*sizeof(DataType);
9513
9514 DataType *pointer =
9515 static_cast<DataType*>(queue.enqueueMapBuffer(buffer, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_WRITE, 0, byteLength, 0, 0, &error));
9516 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueMapBuffer will throw
9517 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9518 return error;
9519 }
9520#if defined(_MSC_VER)
9521 std::copy(
9522 startIterator,
9523 endIterator,
9524 stdext::checked_array_iterator<DataType*>(
9525 pointer, length));
9526#else
9527 std::copy(startIterator, endIterator, pointer);
9528#endif
9529 Event endEvent;
9530 error = queue.enqueueUnmapMemObject(buffer, pointer, 0, &endEvent);
9531 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueUnmapMemObject will throw
9532 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9533 return error;
9534 }
9535 endEvent.wait();
9536 return CL_SUCCESS;
9537}
9538
9544template< typename IteratorType >
9545inline cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator )
9546{
9547 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9548 cl_int error;
9549
9550 size_type length = endIterator-startIterator;
9551 size_type byteLength = length*sizeof(DataType);
9552
9553 DataType *pointer =
9554 static_cast<DataType*>(queue.enqueueMapBuffer(buffer, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_READ, 0, byteLength, 0, 0, &error));
9555 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueMapBuffer will throw
9556 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9557 return error;
9558 }
9559 std::copy(pointer, pointer + length, startIterator);
9560 Event endEvent;
9561 error = queue.enqueueUnmapMemObject(buffer, pointer, 0, &endEvent);
9562 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueUnmapMemObject will throw
9563 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9564 return error;
9565 }
9566 endEvent.wait();
9567 return CL_SUCCESS;
9568}
9569
9570
9571#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9575template<typename T, class Alloc>
9576inline cl_int mapSVM(cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container)
9577{
9578 return enqueueMapSVM(container, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_READ | CL_MAP_WRITE);
9579}
9580
9584template<typename T, class Alloc>
9585inline cl_int unmapSVM(cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container)
9586{
9587 return enqueueUnmapSVM(container);
9588}
9589
9590#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9591

9600 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
9601 size_type host_row_pitch,
9602 size_type host_slice_pitch,
9603 void *ptr,
9604 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9605 Event* event = NULL)
9606{

9615 buffer,

9620 buffer_row_pitch,

9700inline cl_int enqueueReadImage(
9701 const Image& image,
9702 cl_bool blocking,
9703 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
9704 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9705 size_type row_pitch,
9706 size_type slice_pitch,

9709 Event* event = NULL)

9719 image,

9786inline cl_int enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
9787 const Image& src,
9788 const Buffer& dst,
9789 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
9790 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9791 size_type dst_offset,
9792 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9793 Event* event = NULL)
9794{

9797
9798 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9799 return error;
9800 }
9801

9803 src,
9804 dst,
9805 src_origin,
9806 region,
9807 dst_offset,
9808 events,
9809 event);
9810}
9811
9812inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
9813 const Buffer& src,
9814 const Image& dst,
9815 size_type src_offset,
9816 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
9817 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9818 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9819 Event* event = NULL)
9820{

9823
9824 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9825 return error;
9826 }

9829 src,
9830 dst,
9831 src_offset,
9832 dst_origin,
9833 region,
9834 events,
9835 event);
9836}
9837
9838
9839inline cl_int flush(void)
9840{
9841 cl_int error;
9842 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9843
9844 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9845 return error;
9846 }
9847
9848 return queue.flush();
9849}
9850
9851inline cl_int finish(void)
9852{
9853 cl_int error;
9854 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9855
9856 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9857 return error;
9858 }
9859
9860
9861 return queue.finish();
9862}
9863
9864class EnqueueArgs
9865{
9866private:
9867 CommandQueue queue_;
9868 const NDRange offset_;
9869 const NDRange global_;
9870 const NDRange local_;
9871 vector<Event> events_;
9872
9873 template<typename... Ts>
9874 friend class KernelFunctor;
9875
9876public:
9877 EnqueueArgs(NDRange global) :
9878 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9879 offset_(NullRange),
9880 global_(global),
9881 local_(NullRange)
9882 {
9883
9884 }
9885
9886 EnqueueArgs(NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9887 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9888 offset_(NullRange),
9889 global_(global),
9890 local_(local)
9891 {
9892
9893 }
9894
9895 EnqueueArgs(NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9896 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9897 offset_(offset),
9898 global_(global),
9899 local_(local)
9900 {
9901
9902 }
9903
9904 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global) :
9905 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9906 offset_(NullRange),
9907 global_(global),
9908 local_(NullRange)
9909 {
9910 events_.push_back(e);
9911 }
9912
9913 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9914 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9915 offset_(NullRange),
9916 global_(global),
9917 local_(local)
9918 {
9919 events_.push_back(e);
9920 }
9921
9922 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9923 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9924 offset_(offset),
9925 global_(global),
9926 local_(local)
9927 {
9928 events_.push_back(e);
9929 }
9930
9931 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
9932 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9933 offset_(NullRange),
9934 global_(global),
9935 local_(NullRange),
9936 events_(events)
9937 {
9938
9939 }
9940
9941 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9942 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9943 offset_(NullRange),
9944 global_(global),
9945 local_(local),
9946 events_(events)
9947 {
9948
9949 }
9950
9951 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9952 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9953 offset_(offset),
9954 global_(global),
9955 local_(local),
9956 events_(events)
9957 {
9958
9959 }
9960
9961 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global) :
9962 queue_(queue),
9963 offset_(NullRange),
9964 global_(global),
9965 local_(NullRange)
9966 {
9967
9968 }
9969
9970 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9971 queue_(queue),
9972 offset_(NullRange),
9973 global_(global),
9974 local_(local)
9975 {
9976
9977 }
9978
9979 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9980 queue_(queue),
9981 offset_(offset),
9982 global_(global),
9983 local_(local)
9984 {
9985
9986 }
9987
9988 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global) :
9989 queue_(queue),
9990 offset_(NullRange),
9991 global_(global),
9992 local_(NullRange)
9993 {
9994 events_.push_back(e);
9995 }
9996
9997 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9998 queue_(queue),
9999 offset_(NullRange),
10000 global_(global),
10001 local_(local)
10002 {
10003 events_.push_back(e);
10004 }
10005
10006 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10007 queue_(queue),
10008 offset_(offset),
10009 global_(global),
10010 local_(local)
10011 {
10012 events_.push_back(e);
10013 }
10014
10015 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
10016 queue_(queue),
10017 offset_(NullRange),
10018 global_(global),
10019 local_(NullRange),
10020 events_(events)
10021 {
10022
10023 }
10024
10025 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10026 queue_(queue),
10027 offset_(NullRange),
10028 global_(global),
10029 local_(local),
10030 events_(events)
10031 {
10032
10033 }
10034
10035 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10036 queue_(queue),
10037 offset_(offset),
10038 global_(global),
10039 local_(local),
10040 events_(events)
10041 {
10042
10043 }
10044};
10045
10046
10047//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10048
10049
10054template<typename... Ts>
10055class KernelFunctor
10056{
10057private:
10058 Kernel kernel_;
10059
10060 template<int index, typename T0, typename... T1s>
10061 void setArgs(T0&& t0, T1s&&... t1s)
10062 {
10063 kernel_.setArg(index, t0);
10064 setArgs<index + 1, T1s...>(std::forward<T1s>(t1s)...);
10065 }
10066
10067 template<int index, typename T0>
10068 void setArgs(T0&& t0)
10069 {
10070 kernel_.setArg(index, t0);
10071 }
10072
10073 template<int index>
10074 void setArgs()
10075 {
10076 }
10077
10078
10079public:
10080 KernelFunctor(Kernel kernel) : kernel_(kernel)
10081 {}
10082
10083 KernelFunctor(
10084 const Program& program,
10085 const string name,
10086 cl_int * err = NULL) :
10087 kernel_(program, name.c_str(), err)
10088 {}
10089
10091 typedef Event result_type;
10092
10098 Event operator() (
10099 const EnqueueArgs& args,
10100 Ts... ts)
10101 {
10102 Event event;
10103 setArgs<0>(std::forward<Ts>(ts)...);
10104
10105 args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
10106 kernel_,
10107 args.offset_,
10108 args.global_,
10109 args.local_,
10110 &args.events_,
10111 &event);
10112
10113 return event;
10114 }
10115
10122 Event operator() (
10123 const EnqueueArgs& args,
10124 Ts... ts,
10125 cl_int &error)
10126 {
10127 Event event;
10128 setArgs<0>(std::forward<Ts>(ts)...);
10129
10130 error = args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
10131 kernel_,
10132 args.offset_,
10133 args.global_,
10134 args.local_,
10135 &args.events_,
10136 &event);
10137
10138 return event;
10139 }
10140
10141#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
10142 cl_int setSVMPointers(const vector<void*> &pointerList)
10143 {
10144 return kernel_.setSVMPointers(pointerList);
10145 }
10146
10147 template<typename T0, typename... T1s>
10148 cl_int setSVMPointers(const T0 &t0, T1s &... ts)
10149 {
10150 return kernel_.setSVMPointers(t0, ts...);
10151 }
10152#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
10153
10154 Kernel getKernel()
10155 {
10156 return kernel_;
10157 }
10158};
10159
10160namespace compatibility {
10165 template<typename... Ts>
10166 struct make_kernel
10167 {
10168 typedef KernelFunctor<Ts...> FunctorType;
10169
10170 FunctorType functor_;
10171
10172 make_kernel(
10173 const Program& program,
10174 const string name,
10175 cl_int * err = NULL) :
10176 functor_(FunctorType(program, name, err))
10177 {}
10178
10179 make_kernel(
10180 const Kernel kernel) :
10181 functor_(FunctorType(kernel))
10182 {}
10183
10185 typedef Event result_type;
10186
10188 typedef Event type_(
10189 const EnqueueArgs&,
10190 Ts...);
10191
10192 Event operator()(
10193 const EnqueueArgs& enqueueArgs,
10194 Ts... args)
10195 {
10196 return functor_(
10197 enqueueArgs, args...);
10198 }
10199 };
10200} // namespace compatibility
10201
10202
10203//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
